14543 DockNodeRemoveWindow(node, window, node->ID); // Will delete the node so it'll be invalid on return
14544 return;
14545 }
14546 DockNodeRemoveWindow(node, window, node->ID);
14547 window_n--;
14548 continue;
14549 }
14550
14551 // FIXME-DOCKING: Missing policies for conflict resolution, hence the "Experimental" tag on this.
14552 //node->LocalFlagsInWindow &= ~window->WindowClass.DockNodeFlagsOverrideClear;
14553 node->LocalFlagsInWindows |= window->WindowClass.DockNodeFlagsOverrideSet;
14554 }
14555 node->UpdateMergedFlags();
14556
14557 // Auto-hide tab bar option
14558 ImGuiDockNodeFlags node_flags = node->MergedFlags;
14559 if (node->WantHiddenTabBarUpdate && node->Windows.Size == 1 && (node_flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_AutoHideTabBar) && !node->IsHiddenTabBar())
14560 node->WantHiddenTabBarToggle = true;
14561 node->WantHiddenTabBarUpdate = false;
14562
14563 // Cancel toggling if we know our tab bar is enforced to be hidden at all times
14564 if (node->WantHiddenTabBarToggle && node->VisibleWindow && (node->VisibleWindow->WindowClass.DockNodeFlagsOverrideSet & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_HiddenTabBar))
14565 node->WantHiddenTabBarToggle = false;
14566
14567 // Apply toggles at a single point of the frame (here!)
14568 if (node->Windows.Size > 1)
14569 node->SetLocalFlags(node->LocalFlags & ~ImGuiDockNodeFlags_HiddenTabBar);
14570 else if (node->WantHiddenTabBarToggle)
14571 node->SetLocalFlags(node->LocalFlags ^ ImGuiDockNodeFlags_HiddenTabBar);
14572 node->WantHiddenTabBarToggle = false;
14573
14574 DockNodeUpdateVisibleFlag(node);
14575}
14576
14577// This is rarely called as DockNodeUpdateForRootNode() generally does it most frames.
14578static void ImGui::DockNodeUpdateHasCentralNodeChild(ImGuiDockNode* node)
14579{
14580 node->HasCentralNodeChild = false;
14581 if (node->ChildNodes[0])
14582 DockNodeUpdateHasCentralNodeChild(node->ChildNodes[0]);
14583 if (node->ChildNodes[1])
14584 DockNodeUpdateHasCentralNodeChild(node->ChildNodes[1]);
14585 if (node->IsRootNode())
14586 {
14587 ImGuiDockNode* mark_node = node->CentralNode;
14588 while (mark_node)
14589 {
14590 mark_node->HasCentralNodeChild = true;
14591 mark_node = mark_node->ParentNode;
14592 }
14593 }
14594}
14595
14596static void ImGui::DockNodeUpdateVisibleFlag(ImGuiDockNode* node)
14597{
14598 // Update visibility flag
14599 bool is_visible = (node->ParentNode == NULL) ? node->IsDockSpace() : node->IsCentralNode();
14600 is_visible |= (node->Windows.Size > 0);
14601 is_visible |= (node->ChildNodes[0] && node->ChildNodes[0]->IsVisible);
14602 is_visible |= (node->ChildNodes[1] && node->ChildNodes[1]->IsVisible);
14603 node->IsVisible = is_visible;
14604}
14605
14606static void ImGui::DockNodeStartMouseMovingWindow(ImGuiDockNode* node, ImGuiWindow* window)
14607{
14608 ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
14609 IM_ASSERT(node->WantMouseMove == true);
14610 StartMouseMovingWindow(window);
14611 g.ActiveIdClickOffset = g.IO.MouseClickedPos[0] - node->Pos;
14612 g.MovingWindow = window; // If we are docked into a non moveable root window, StartMouseMovingWindow() won't set g.MovingWindow. Override that decision.
14613 node->WantMouseMove = false;
14614}
14615
14616// Update CentralNode, OnlyNodeWithWindows, LastFocusedNodeID. Copy window class.
14617static void ImGui::DockNodeUpdateForRootNode(ImGuiDockNode* node)
14618{
14619 DockNodeUpdateFlagsAndCollapse(node);
14620
14621 // - Setup central node pointers
14622 // - Find if there's only a single visible window in the hierarchy (in which case we need to display a regular title bar -> FIXME-DOCK: that last part is not done yet!)
14623 // Cannot merge this with DockNodeUpdateFlagsAndCollapse() because FirstNodeWithWindows is found after window removal and child collapsing
14624 ImGuiDockNodeTreeInfo info;
14625 DockNodeFindInfo(node, &info);
14626 node->CentralNode = info.CentralNode;
14627 node->OnlyNodeWithWindows = (info.CountNodesWithWindows == 1) ? info.FirstNodeWithWindows : NULL;
14628 node->CountNodeWithWindows = info.CountNodesWithWindows;
14629 if (node->LastFocusedNodeId == 0 && info.FirstNodeWithWindows != NULL)
14630 node->LastFocusedNodeId = info.FirstNodeWithWindows->ID;
14631
14632 // Copy the window class from of our first window so it can be used for proper dock filtering.
14633 // When node has mixed windows, prioritize the class with the most constraint (DockingAllowUnclassed = false) as the reference to copy.
14634 // FIXME-DOCK: We don't recurse properly, this code could be reworked to work from DockNodeUpdateScanRec.
14635 if (ImGuiDockNode* first_node_with_windows = info.FirstNodeWithWindows)
14636 {
14637 node->WindowClass = first_node_with_windows->Windows[0]->WindowClass;
14638 for (int n = 1; n < first_node_with_windows->Windows.Size; n++)
14639 if (first_node_with_windows->Windows[n]->WindowClass.DockingAllowUnclassed == false)
14640 {
14641 node->WindowClass = first_node_with_windows->Windows[n]->WindowClass;
14642 break;
14643 }
14644 }
14645
14646 ImGuiDockNode* mark_node = node->CentralNode;
14647 while (mark_node)
14648 {
14649 mark_node->HasCentralNodeChild = true;
14650 mark_node = mark_node->ParentNode;
14651 }
14652}
14653
14654static void DockNodeSetupHostWindow(ImGuiDockNode* node, ImGuiWindow* host_window)
14655{
14656 // Remove ourselves from any previous different host window
14657 // This can happen if a user mistakenly does (see #4295 for details):
14658 // - N+0: DockBuilderAddNode(id, 0) // missing ImGuiDockNodeFlags_DockSpace
14659 // - N+1: NewFrame() // will create floating host window for that node
14660 // - N+1: DockSpace(id) // requalify node as dockspace, moving host window
14661 if (node->HostWindow && node->HostWindow != host_window && node->HostWindow->DockNodeAsHost == node)
14662 node->HostWindow->DockNodeAsHost = NULL;
14663
14664 host_window->DockNodeAsHost = node;
14665 node->HostWindow = host_window;
14666}
14667
14668static void ImGui::DockNodeUpdate(ImGuiDockNode* node)
14669{
14670 ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
14671 IM_ASSERT(node->LastFrameActive != g.FrameCount);
14672 node->LastFrameAlive = g.FrameCount;
14673 node->IsBgDrawnThisFrame = false;
14674
14675 node->CentralNode = node->OnlyNodeWithWindows = NULL;
14676 if (node->IsRootNode())
14677 DockNodeUpdateForRootNode(node);
14678
14679 // Remove tab bar if not needed
14680 if (node->TabBar && node->IsNoTabBar())
14681 DockNodeRemoveTabBar(node);
14682
14683 // Early out for hidden root dock nodes (when all DockId references are in inactive windows, or there is only 1 floating window holding on the DockId)
14684 bool want_to_hide_host_window = false;
14685 if (node->IsFloatingNode())
14686 {
14687 if (node->Windows.Size <= 1 && node->IsLeafNode())
14688 if (!g.IO.ConfigDockingAlwaysTabBar && (node->Windows.Size == 0 || !node->Windows[0]->WindowClass.DockingAlwaysTabBar))
14689 want_to_hide_host_window = true;
14690 if (node->CountNodeWithWindows == 0)
14691 want_to_hide_host_window = true;
14692 }
14693 if (want_to_hide_host_window)
14694 {
14695 if (node->Windows.Size == 1)
14696 {
14697 // Floating window pos/size is authoritative
14698 ImGuiWindow* single_window = node->Windows[0];
14699 node->Pos = single_window->Pos;
14700 node->Size = single_window->SizeFull;
14701 node->AuthorityForPos = node->AuthorityForSize = node->AuthorityForViewport = ImGuiDataAuthority_Window;
14702
14703 // Transfer focus immediately so when we revert to a regular window it is immediately selected
14704 if (node->HostWindow && g.NavWindow == node->HostWindow)
14705 FocusWindow(single_window);
14706 if (node->HostWindow)
14707 {
14708 single_window->Viewport = node->HostWindow->Viewport;
14709 single_window->ViewportId = node->HostWindow->ViewportId;
14710 if (node->HostWindow->ViewportOwned)
14711 {
14712 single_window->Viewport->Window = single_window;
14713 single_window->ViewportOwned = true;
14714 }
14715 }
14716 }
14717
14718 DockNodeHideHostWindow(node);
14719 node->State = ImGuiDockNodeState_HostWindowHiddenBecauseSingleWindow;
14720 node->WantCloseAll = false;
14721 node->WantCloseTabId = 0;
14722 node->HasCloseButton = node->HasWindowMenuButton = false;
14723 node->LastFrameActive = g.FrameCount;
14724
14725 if (node->WantMouseMove && node->Windows.Size == 1)
14726 DockNodeStartMouseMovingWindow(node, node->Windows[0]);
14727 return;
14728 }
14729
14730 // In some circumstance we will defer creating the host window (so everything will be kept hidden),
14731 // while the expected visible window is resizing itself.
14732 // This is important for first-time (no ini settings restored) single window when io.ConfigDockingAlwaysTabBar is enabled,
14733 // otherwise the node ends up using the minimum window size. Effectively those windows will take an extra frame to show up:
14734 // N+0: Begin(): window created (with no known size), node is created
14735 // N+1: DockNodeUpdate(): node skip creating host window / Begin(): window size applied, not visible
14736 // N+2: DockNodeUpdate(): node can create host window / Begin(): window becomes visible
14737 // We could remove this frame if we could reliably calculate the expected window size during node update, before the Begin() code.
14738 // It would require a generalization of CalcWindowExpectedSize(), probably extracting code away from Begin().
14739 // In reality it isn't very important as user quickly ends up with size data in .ini file.
14740 if (node->IsVisible && node->HostWindow == NULL && node->IsFloatingNode() && node->IsLeafNode())
14741 {
14742 IM_ASSERT(node->Windows.Size > 0);
14743 ImGuiWindow* ref_window = NULL;
14744 if (node->SelectedTabId != 0) // Note that we prune single-window-node settings on .ini loading, so this is generally 0 for them!
14745 ref_window = DockNodeFindWindowByID(node, node->SelectedTabId);
14746 if (ref_window == NULL)
14747 ref_window = node->Windows[0];
14748 if (ref_window->AutoFitFramesX > 0 || ref_window->AutoFitFramesY > 0)
14749 {
14750 node->State = ImGuiDockNodeState_HostWindowHiddenBecauseWindowsAreResizing;
14751 return;
14752 }
14753 }
14754
14755 const ImGuiDockNodeFlags node_flags = node->MergedFlags;
14756
14757 // Decide if the node will have a close button and a window menu button
14758 node->HasWindowMenuButton = (node->Windows.Size > 0) && (node_flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoWindowMenuButton) == 0;
14759 node->HasCloseButton = false;
14760 for (int window_n = 0; window_n < node->Windows.Size; window_n++)
14761 {
14762 // FIXME-DOCK: Setting DockIsActive here means that for single active window in a leaf node, DockIsActive will be cleared until the next Begin() call.
14763 ImGuiWindow* window = node->Windows[window_n];
14764 node->HasCloseButton |= window->HasCloseButton;
14765 window->DockIsActive = (node->Windows.Size > 1);
14766 }
14767 if (node_flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoCloseButton)
14768 node->HasCloseButton = false;
14769
14770 // Bind or create host window
14771 ImGuiWindow* host_window = NULL;
14772 bool beginned_into_host_window = false;
14773 if (node->IsDockSpace())
14774 {
14775 // [Explicit root dockspace node]
14776 IM_ASSERT(node->HostWindow);
14777 host_window = node->HostWindow;
14778 }
14779 else
14780 {
14781 // [Automatic root or child nodes]
14782 if (node->IsRootNode() && node->IsVisible)
14783 {
14784 ImGuiWindow* ref_window = (node->Windows.Size > 0) ? node->Windows[0] : NULL;
14785
14786 // Sync Pos
14787 if (node->AuthorityForPos == ImGuiDataAuthority_Window && ref_window)
14788 SetNextWindowPos(ref_window->Pos);
14789 else if (node->AuthorityForPos == ImGuiDataAuthority_DockNode)
14790 SetNextWindowPos(node->Pos);
14791
14792 // Sync Size
14793 if (node->AuthorityForSize == ImGuiDataAuthority_Window && ref_window)
14794 SetNextWindowSize(ref_window->SizeFull);
14795 else if (node->AuthorityForSize == ImGuiDataAuthority_DockNode)
14796 SetNextWindowSize(node->Size);
14797
14798 // Sync Collapsed
14799 if (node->AuthorityForSize == ImGuiDataAuthority_Window && ref_window)
14800 SetNextWindowCollapsed(ref_window->Collapsed);
14801
14802 // Sync Viewport
14803 if (node->AuthorityForViewport == ImGuiDataAuthority_Window && ref_window)
14804 SetNextWindowViewport(ref_window->ViewportId);
14805
14806 SetNextWindowClass(&node->WindowClass);
14807
14808 // Begin into the host window
14809 char window_label[20];
14810 DockNodeGetHostWindowTitle(node, window_label, IM_ARRAYSIZE(window_label));
14811 ImGuiWindowFlags window_flags = ImGuiWindowFlags_NoScrollbar | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoScrollWithMouse | ImGuiWindowFlags_DockNodeHost;
14812 window_flags |= ImGuiWindowFlags_NoFocusOnAppearing;
14813 window_flags |= ImGuiWindowFlags_NoSavedSettings | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoNavFocus | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoCollapse;
14814 window_flags |= ImGuiWindowFlags_NoTitleBar;
14815
14816 SetNextWindowBgAlpha(0.0f); // Don't set ImGuiWindowFlags_NoBackground because it disables borders
14817 PushStyleVar(ImGuiStyleVar_WindowPadding, ImVec2(0, 0));
14818 Begin(window_label, NULL, window_flags);
14819 PopStyleVar();
14820 beginned_into_host_window = true;
14821
14822 host_window = g.CurrentWindow;
14823 DockNodeSetupHostWindow(node, host_window);
14824 host_window->DC.CursorPos = host_window->Pos;
14825 node->Pos = host_window->Pos;
14826 node->Size = host_window->Size;
14827
14828 // We set ImGuiWindowFlags_NoFocusOnAppearing because we don't want the host window to take full focus (e.g. steal NavWindow)
14829 // But we still it bring it to the front of display. There's no way to choose this precise behavior via window flags.
14830 // One simple case to ponder if: window A has a toggle to create windows B/C/D. Dock B/C/D together, clear the toggle and enable it again.
14831 // When reappearing B/C/D will request focus and be moved to the top of the display pile, but they are not linked to the dock host window
14832 // during the frame they appear. The dock host window would keep its old display order, and the sorting in EndFrame would move B/C/D back
14833 // after the dock host window, losing their top-most status.
14834 if (node->HostWindow->Appearing)
14835 BringWindowToDisplayFront(node->HostWindow);
14836
14837 node->AuthorityForPos = node->AuthorityForSize = node->AuthorityForViewport = ImGuiDataAuthority_Auto;
14838 }
14839 else if (node->ParentNode)
14840 {
14841 node->HostWindow = host_window = node->ParentNode->HostWindow;
14842 node->AuthorityForPos = node->AuthorityForSize = node->AuthorityForViewport = ImGuiDataAuthority_Auto;
14843 }
14844 if (node->WantMouseMove && node->HostWindow)
14845 DockNodeStartMouseMovingWindow(node, node->HostWindow);
14846 }
14847
14848 // Update focused node (the one whose title bar is highlight) within a node tree
14849 if (node->IsSplitNode())
14850 IM_ASSERT(node->TabBar == NULL);
14851 if (node->IsRootNode())
14852 if (g.NavWindow && g.NavWindow->RootWindow->DockNode && g.NavWindow->RootWindow->ParentWindow == host_window)
14853 node->LastFocusedNodeId = g.NavWindow->RootWindow->DockNode->ID;
14854
14855 // Register a hit-test hole in the window unless we are currently dragging a window that is compatible with our dockspace
14856 ImGuiDockNode* central_node = node->CentralNode;
14857 const bool central_node_hole = node->IsRootNode() && host_window && (node_flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_PassthruCentralNode) != 0 && central_node != NULL && central_node->IsEmpty();
14858 bool central_node_hole_register_hit_test_hole = central_node_hole;
14859 if (central_node_hole)
14860 if (const ImGuiPayload* payload = ImGui::GetDragDropPayload())
14861 if (payload->IsDataType(IMGUI_PAYLOAD_TYPE_WINDOW) && DockNodeIsDropAllowed(host_window, *(ImGuiWindow**)payload->Data))
14862 central_node_hole_register_hit_test_hole = false;
14863 if (central_node_hole_register_hit_test_hole)
14864 {
14865 // We add a little padding to match the "resize from edges" behavior and allow grabbing the splitter easily.
14866 // (But we only add it if there's something else on the other side of the hole, otherwise for e.g. fullscreen
14867 // covering passthru node we'd have a gap on the edge not covered by the hole)
14868 IM_ASSERT(node->IsDockSpace()); // We cannot pass this flag without the DockSpace() api. Testing this because we also setup the hole in host_window->ParentNode
14869 ImGuiDockNode* root_node = DockNodeGetRootNode(central_node);
14870 ImRect root_rect(root_node->Pos, root_node->Pos + root_node->Size);
14871 ImRect hole_rect(central_node->Pos, central_node->Pos + central_node->Size);
14872 if (hole_rect.Min.x > root_rect.Min.x) { hole_rect.Min.x += WINDOWS_HOVER_PADDING; }
14873 if (hole_rect.Max.x < root_rect.Max.x) { hole_rect.Max.x -= WINDOWS_HOVER_PADDING; }
14874 if (hole_rect.Min.y > root_rect.Min.y) { hole_rect.Min.y += WINDOWS_HOVER_PADDING; }
14875 if (hole_rect.Max.y < root_rect.Max.y) { hole_rect.Max.y -= WINDOWS_HOVER_PADDING; }
14876 //GetForegroundDrawList()->AddRect(hole_rect.Min, hole_rect.Max, IM_COL32(255, 0, 0, 255));
14877 if (central_node_hole && !hole_rect.IsInverted())
14878 {
14879 SetWindowHitTestHole(host_window, hole_rect.Min, hole_rect.Max - hole_rect.Min);
14880 SetWindowHitTestHole(host_window->ParentWindow, hole_rect.Min, hole_rect.Max - hole_rect.Min);
14881 }
14882 }
14883
14884 // Update position/size, process and draw resizing splitters
14885 if (node->IsRootNode() && host_window)
14886 {
14887 host_window->DrawList->ChannelsSetCurrent(1);
14888 DockNodeTreeUpdatePosSize(node, host_window->Pos, host_window->Size);
14889 DockNodeTreeUpdateSplitter(node);
14890 }
14891
14892 // Draw empty node background (currently can only be the Central Node)
14893 if (host_window && node->IsEmpty() && node->IsVisible)
14894 {
14895 host_window->DrawList->ChannelsSetCurrent(0);
14896 node->LastBgColor = (node_flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_PassthruCentralNode) ? 0 : GetColorU32(ImGuiCol_DockingEmptyBg);
14897 if (node->LastBgColor != 0)
14898 host_window->DrawList->AddRectFilled(node->Pos, node->Pos + node->Size, node->LastBgColor);
14899 node->IsBgDrawnThisFrame = true;
14900 }
14901
14902 // Draw whole dockspace background if ImGuiDockNodeFlags_PassthruCentralNode if set.
14903 // We need to draw a background at the root level if requested by ImGuiDockNodeFlags_PassthruCentralNode, but we will only know the correct pos/size
14904 // _after_ processing the resizing splitters. So we are using the DrawList channel splitting facility to submit drawing primitives out of order!
14905 const bool render_dockspace_bg = node->IsRootNode() && host_window && (node_flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_PassthruCentralNode) != 0;
14906 if (render_dockspace_bg && node->IsVisible)
14907 {
14908 host_window->DrawList->ChannelsSetCurrent(0);
14909 if (central_node_hole)
14910 RenderRectFilledWithHole(host_window->DrawList, node->Rect(), central_node->Rect(), GetColorU32(ImGuiCol_WindowBg), 0.0f);
14911 else
14912 host_window->DrawList->AddRectFilled(node->Pos, node->Pos + node->Size, GetColorU32(ImGuiCol_WindowBg), 0.0f);
14913 }
14914
14915 // Draw and populate Tab Bar
14916 if (host_window)
14917 host_window->DrawList->ChannelsSetCurrent(1);
14918 if (host_window && node->Windows.Size > 0)
14919 {
14920 DockNodeUpdateTabBar(node, host_window);
14921 }
14922 else
14923 {
14924 node->WantCloseAll = false;
14925 node->WantCloseTabId = 0;
14926 node->IsFocused = false;
14927 }
14928 if (node->TabBar && node->TabBar->SelectedTabId)
14929 node->SelectedTabId = node->TabBar->SelectedTabId;
14930 else if (node->Windows.Size > 0)
14931 node->SelectedTabId = node->Windows[0]->ID;
14932
14933 // Draw payload drop target
14934 if (host_window && node->IsVisible)
14935 if (node->IsRootNode() && (g.MovingWindow == NULL || g.MovingWindow->RootWindowDockTree != host_window))
14936 BeginDockableDragDropTarget(host_window);
14937
14938 // We update this after DockNodeUpdateTabBar()
14939 node->LastFrameActive = g.FrameCount;
14940
14941 // Recurse into children
14942 // FIXME-DOCK FIXME-OPT: Should not need to recurse into children
14943 if (host_window)
14944 {
14945 if (node->ChildNodes[0])
14946 DockNodeUpdate(node->ChildNodes[0]);
14947 if (node->ChildNodes[1])
14948 DockNodeUpdate(node->ChildNodes[1]);
14949
14950 // Render outer borders last (after the tab bar)
14951 if (node->IsRootNode())
14952 {
14953 host_window->DrawList->ChannelsSetCurrent(1);
14954 RenderWindowOuterBorders(host_window);
14955 }
14956
14957 // Further rendering (= hosted windows background) will be drawn on layer 0
14958 host_window->DrawList->ChannelsSetCurrent(0);
14959 }
14960
14961 // End host window
14962 if (beginned_into_host_window) //-V1020
14963 End();
14964}
14965
14966// Compare TabItem nodes given the last known DockOrder (will persist in .ini file as hint), used to sort tabs when multiple tabs are added on the same frame.
14967static int IMGUI_CDECL TabItemComparerByDockOrder(const void* lhs, const void* rhs)
14968{
14969 ImGuiWindow* a = ((const ImGuiTabItem*)lhs)->Window;
14970 ImGuiWindow* b = ((const ImGuiTabItem*)rhs)->Window;
14971 if (int d = ((a->DockOrder == -1) ? INT_MAX : a->DockOrder) - ((b->DockOrder == -1) ? INT_MAX : b->DockOrder))
14972 return d;
14973 return (a->BeginOrderWithinContext - b->BeginOrderWithinContext);
14974}
14975
14976static ImGuiID ImGui::DockNodeUpdateWindowMenu(ImGuiDockNode* node, ImGuiTabBar* tab_bar)
14977{
14978 // Try to position the menu so it is more likely to stays within the same viewport
14979 ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
14980 ImGuiID ret_tab_id = 0;
14981 if (g.Style.WindowMenuButtonPosition == ImGuiDir_Left)
14982 SetNextWindowPos(ImVec2(node->Pos.x, node->Pos.y + GetFrameHeight()), ImGuiCond_Always, ImVec2(0.0f, 0.0f));
14983 else
14984 SetNextWindowPos(ImVec2(node->Pos.x + node->Size.x, node->Pos.y + GetFrameHeight()), ImGuiCond_Always, ImVec2(1.0f, 0.0f));
14985 if (BeginPopup("#WindowMenu"))
14986 {
14987 node->IsFocused = true;
14988 if (tab_bar->Tabs.Size == 1)
14989 {
14990 if (MenuItem("Hide tab bar", NULL, node->IsHiddenTabBar()))
14991 node->WantHiddenTabBarToggle = true;
14992 }
14993 else
14994 {
14995 for (int tab_n = 0; tab_n < tab_bar->Tabs.Size; tab_n++)
14996 {
14997 ImGuiTabItem* tab = &tab_bar->Tabs[tab_n];
14998 if (tab->Flags & ImGuiTabItemFlags_Button)
14999 continue;
15000 if (Selectable(tab_bar->GetTabName(tab), tab->ID == tab_bar->SelectedTabId))
15001 ret_tab_id = tab->ID;
15002 SameLine();
15003 Text(" ");
15004 }
15005 }
15006 EndPopup();
15007 }
15008 return ret_tab_id;
15009}
15010
15011// User helper to append/amend into a dock node tab bar. Most commonly used to add e.g. a "+" button.
15012bool ImGui::DockNodeBeginAmendTabBar(ImGuiDockNode* node)
15013{
15014 if (node->TabBar == NULL || node->HostWindow == NULL)
15015 return false;
15016 if (node->MergedFlags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_KeepAliveOnly)
15017 return false;
15018 Begin(node->HostWindow->Name);
15019 PushOverrideID(node->ID);
15020 bool ret = BeginTabBarEx(node->TabBar, node->TabBar->BarRect, node->TabBar->Flags, node);
15021 IM_UNUSED(ret);
15022 IM_ASSERT(ret);
15023 return true;
15024}
15025
15026void ImGui::DockNodeEndAmendTabBar()
15027{
15028 EndTabBar();
15029 PopID();
15030 End();
15031}
15032
15033// Submit the tab bar corresponding to a dock node and various housekeeping details.
15034static void ImGui::DockNodeUpdateTabBar(ImGuiDockNode* node, ImGuiWindow* host_window)
15035{
15036 ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
15037 ImGuiStyle& style = g.Style;
15038
15039 const bool node_was_active = (node->LastFrameActive + 1 == g.FrameCount);
15040 const bool closed_all = node->WantCloseAll && node_was_active;
15041 const ImGuiID closed_one = node->WantCloseTabId && node_was_active;
15042 node->WantCloseAll = false;
15043 node->WantCloseTabId = 0;
15044
15045 // Decide if we should use a focused title bar color
15046 bool is_focused = false;
15047 ImGuiDockNode* root_node = DockNodeGetRootNode(node);
15048 if (g.NavWindowingTarget)
15049 is_focused = (g.NavWindowingTarget->DockNode == node);
15050 else if (g.NavWindow && g.NavWindow->RootWindowForTitleBarHighlight == host_window->RootWindowDockTree && root_node->LastFocusedNodeId == node->ID)
15051 is_focused = true;
15052
15053 // Hidden tab bar will show a triangle on the upper-left (in Begin)
15054 if (node->IsHiddenTabBar() || node->IsNoTabBar())
15055 {
15056 node->VisibleWindow = (node->Windows.Size > 0) ? node->Windows[0] : NULL;
15057 node->IsFocused = is_focused;
15058 if (is_focused)
15059 node->LastFrameFocused = g.FrameCount;
15060 if (node->VisibleWindow)
15061 {
15062 // Notify root of visible window (used to display title in OS task bar)
15063 if (is_focused || root_node->VisibleWindow == NULL)
15064 root_node->VisibleWindow = node->VisibleWindow;
15065 if (node->TabBar)
15066 node->TabBar->VisibleTabId = node->VisibleWindow->ID;
15067 }
15068 return;
15069 }
15070
15071 // Move ourselves to the Menu layer (so we can be accessed by tapping Alt) + undo SkipItems flag in order to draw over the title bar even if the window is collapsed
15072 bool backup_skip_item = host_window->SkipItems;
15073 if (!node->IsDockSpace())
15074 {
15075 host_window->SkipItems = false;
15076 host_window->DC.NavLayerCurrent = ImGuiNavLayer_Menu;
15077 }
15078
15079 // Use PushOverrideID() instead of PushID() to use the node id _without_ the host window ID.
15080 // This is to facilitate computing those ID from the outside, and will affect more or less only the ID of the collapse button, popup and tabs,
15081 // as docked windows themselves will override the stack with their own root ID.
15082 PushOverrideID(node->ID);
15083 ImGuiTabBar* tab_bar = node->TabBar;
15084 bool tab_bar_is_recreated = (tab_bar == NULL); // Tab bar are automatically destroyed when a node gets hidden
15085 if (tab_bar == NULL)
15086 {
15087 DockNodeAddTabBar(node);
15088 tab_bar = node->TabBar;
15089 }
15090
15091 ImGuiID focus_tab_id = 0;
15092 node->IsFocused = is_focused;
15093
15094 const ImGuiDockNodeFlags node_flags = node->MergedFlags;
15095 const bool has_window_menu_button = (node_flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoWindowMenuButton) == 0 && (style.WindowMenuButtonPosition != ImGuiDir_None);
15096
15097 // In a dock node, the Collapse Button turns into the Window Menu button.
15098 // FIXME-DOCK FIXME-OPT: Could we recycle popups id across multiple dock nodes?
15099 if (has_window_menu_button && IsPopupOpen("#WindowMenu"))
15100 {
15101 if (ImGuiID tab_id = DockNodeUpdateWindowMenu(node, tab_bar))
15102 focus_tab_id = tab_bar->NextSelectedTabId = tab_id;
15103 is_focused |= node->IsFocused;
15104 }
15105
15106 // Layout
15107 ImRect title_bar_rect, tab_bar_rect;
15108 ImVec2 window_menu_button_pos;
15109 ImVec2 close_button_pos;
15110 DockNodeCalcTabBarLayout(node, &title_bar_rect, &tab_bar_rect, &window_menu_button_pos, &close_button_pos);
15111
15112 // Submit new tabs, they will be added as Unsorted and sorted below based on relative DockOrder value.
15113 const int tabs_count_old = tab_bar->Tabs.Size;
15114 for (int window_n = 0; window_n < node->Windows.Size; window_n++)
15115 {
15116 ImGuiWindow* window = node->Windows[window_n];
15117 if (TabBarFindTabByID(tab_bar, window->ID) == NULL)
15118 TabBarAddTab(tab_bar, ImGuiTabItemFlags_Unsorted, window);
15119 }
15120
15121 // Title bar
15122 if (is_focused)
15123 node->LastFrameFocused = g.FrameCount;
15124 ImU32 title_bar_col = GetColorU32(host_window->Collapsed ? ImGuiCol_TitleBgCollapsed : is_focused ? ImGuiCol_TitleBgActive : ImGuiCol_TitleBg);
15125 ImDrawFlags rounding_flags = CalcRoundingFlagsForRectInRect(title_bar_rect, host_window->Rect(), DOCKING_SPLITTER_SIZE);
15126 host_window->DrawList->AddRectFilled(title_bar_rect.Min, title_bar_rect.Max, title_bar_col, host_window->WindowRounding, rounding_flags);
15127
15128 // Docking/Collapse button
15129 if (has_window_menu_button)
15130 {
15131 if (CollapseButton(host_window->GetID("#COLLAPSE"), window_menu_button_pos, node)) // == DockNodeGetWindowMenuButtonId(node)
15132 OpenPopup("#WindowMenu");
15133 if (IsItemActive())
15134 focus_tab_id = tab_bar->SelectedTabId;
15135 }
15136
15137 // If multiple tabs are appearing on the same frame, sort them based on their persistent DockOrder value
15138 int tabs_unsorted_start = tab_bar->Tabs.Size;
15139 for (int tab_n = tab_bar->Tabs.Size - 1; tab_n >= 0 && (tab_bar->Tabs[tab_n].Flags & ImGuiTabItemFlags_Unsorted); tab_n--)
15140 {
15141 // FIXME-DOCK: Consider only clearing the flag after the tab has been alive for a few consecutive frames, allowing late comers to not break sorting?
15142 tab_bar->Tabs[tab_n].Flags &= ~ImGuiTabItemFlags_Unsorted;
15143 tabs_unsorted_start = tab_n;
15144 }
15145 if (tab_bar->Tabs.Size > tabs_unsorted_start)
15146 {
15147 IMGUI_DEBUG_LOG_DOCKING("In node 0x%08X: %d new appearing tabs:%s\n", node->ID, tab_bar->Tabs.Size - tabs_unsorted_start, (tab_bar->Tabs.Size > tabs_unsorted_start + 1) ? " (will sort)" : "");
15148 for (int tab_n = tabs_unsorted_start; tab_n < tab_bar->Tabs.Size; tab_n++)
15149 IMGUI_DEBUG_LOG_DOCKING(" - Tab '%s' Order %d\n", tab_bar->Tabs[tab_n].Window->Name, tab_bar->Tabs[tab_n].Window->DockOrder);
15150 if (tab_bar->Tabs.Size > tabs_unsorted_start + 1)
15151 ImQsort(tab_bar->Tabs.Data + tabs_unsorted_start, tab_bar->Tabs.Size - tabs_unsorted_start, sizeof(ImGuiTabItem), TabItemComparerByDockOrder);
15152 }
15153
15154 // Apply NavWindow focus back to the tab bar
15155 if (g.NavWindow && g.NavWindow->RootWindow->DockNode == node)
15156 tab_bar->SelectedTabId = g.NavWindow->RootWindow->ID;
15157
15158 // Selected newly added tabs, or persistent tab ID if the tab bar was just recreated
15159 if (tab_bar_is_recreated && TabBarFindTabByID(tab_bar, node->SelectedTabId) != NULL)
15160 tab_bar->SelectedTabId = tab_bar->NextSelectedTabId = node->SelectedTabId;
15161 else if (tab_bar->Tabs.Size > tabs_count_old)
15162 tab_bar->SelectedTabId = tab_bar->NextSelectedTabId = tab_bar->Tabs.back().Window->ID;
15163
15164 // Begin tab bar
15165 ImGuiTabBarFlags tab_bar_flags = ImGuiTabBarFlags_Reorderable | ImGuiTabBarFlags_AutoSelectNewTabs; // | ImGuiTabBarFlags_NoTabListScrollingButtons);
15166 tab_bar_flags |= ImGuiTabBarFlags_SaveSettings | ImGuiTabBarFlags_DockNode;
15167 if (!host_window->Collapsed && is_focused)
15168 tab_bar_flags |= ImGuiTabBarFlags_IsFocused;
15169 BeginTabBarEx(tab_bar, tab_bar_rect, tab_bar_flags, node);
15170 //host_window->DrawList->AddRect(tab_bar_rect.Min, tab_bar_rect.Max, IM_COL32(255,0,255,255));
15171
15172 // Backup style colors
15173 ImVec4 backup_style_cols[ImGuiWindowDockStyleCol_COUNT];
15174 for (int color_n = 0; color_n < ImGuiWindowDockStyleCol_COUNT; color_n++)
15175 backup_style_cols[color_n] = g.Style.Colors[GWindowDockStyleColors[color_n]];
15176
15177 // Submit actual tabs
15178 node->VisibleWindow = NULL;
15179 for (int window_n = 0; window_n < node->Windows.Size; window_n++)
15180 {
15181 ImGuiWindow* window = node->Windows[window_n];
15182 if ((closed_all || closed_one == window->ID) && window->HasCloseButton && !(window->Flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_UnsavedDocument))
15183 continue;
15184 if (window->LastFrameActive + 1 >= g.FrameCount || !node_was_active)
15185 {
15186 ImGuiTabItemFlags tab_item_flags = 0;
15187 tab_item_flags |= window->WindowClass.TabItemFlagsOverrideSet;
15188 if (window->Flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_UnsavedDocument)
15189 tab_item_flags |= ImGuiTabItemFlags_UnsavedDocument;
15190 if (tab_bar->Flags & ImGuiTabBarFlags_NoCloseWithMiddleMouseButton)
15191 tab_item_flags |= ImGuiTabItemFlags_NoCloseWithMiddleMouseButton;
15192
15193 // Apply stored style overrides for the window
15194 for (int color_n = 0; color_n < ImGuiWindowDockStyleCol_COUNT; color_n++)
15195 g.Style.Colors[GWindowDockStyleColors[color_n]] = ColorConvertU32ToFloat4(window->DockStyle.Colors[color_n]);
15196
15197 bool tab_open = true;
15198 TabItemEx(tab_bar, window->Name, window->HasCloseButton ? &tab_open : NULL, tab_item_flags, window);
15199 if (!tab_open)
15200 node->WantCloseTabId = window->ID;
15201 if (tab_bar->VisibleTabId == window->ID)
15202 node->VisibleWindow = window;
15203
15204 // Store last item data so it can be queried with IsItemXXX functions after the user Begin() call
15205 window->DockTabItemStatusFlags = g.LastItemData.StatusFlags;
15206 window->DockTabItemRect = g.LastItemData.Rect;
15207
15208 // Update navigation ID on menu layer
15209 if (g.NavWindow && g.NavWindow->RootWindow == window && (window->DC.NavLayersActiveMask & (1 << ImGuiNavLayer_Menu)) == 0)
15210 host_window->NavLastIds[1] = window->ID;
15211 }
15212 }
15213
15214 // Restore style colors
15215 for (int color_n = 0; color_n < ImGuiWindowDockStyleCol_COUNT; color_n++)
15216 g.Style.Colors[GWindowDockStyleColors[color_n]] = backup_style_cols[color_n];
15217
15218 // Notify root of visible window (used to display title in OS task bar)
15219 if (node->VisibleWindow)
15220 if (is_focused || root_node->VisibleWindow == NULL)
15221 root_node->VisibleWindow = node->VisibleWindow;
15222
15223 // Close button (after VisibleWindow was updated)
15224 // Note that VisibleWindow may have been overrided by CTRL+Tabbing, so VisibleWindow->ID may be != from tab_bar->SelectedTabId
15225 const bool close_button_is_enabled = node->HasCloseButton && node->VisibleWindow && node->VisibleWindow->HasCloseButton;
15226 const bool close_button_is_visible = node->HasCloseButton;
15227 //const bool close_button_is_visible = close_button_is_enabled; // Most people would expect this behavior of not even showing the button (leaving a hole since we can't claim that space as other windows in the tba bar have one)
15228 if (close_button_is_visible)
15229 {
15230 if (!close_button_is_enabled)
15231 {
15232 PushItemFlag(ImGuiItemFlags_Disabled, true);
15233 PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_Text, style.Colors[ImGuiCol_Text] * ImVec4(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f,0.4f));
15234 }
15235 if (CloseButton(host_window->GetID("#CLOSE"), close_button_pos))
15236 {
15237 node->WantCloseAll = true;
15238 for (int n = 0; n < tab_bar->Tabs.Size; n++)
15239 TabBarCloseTab(tab_bar, &tab_bar->Tabs[n]);
15240 }
15241 //if (IsItemActive())
15242 // focus_tab_id = tab_bar->SelectedTabId;
15243 if (!close_button_is_enabled)
15244 {
15245 PopStyleColor();
15246 PopItemFlag();
15247 }
15248 }
15249
15250 // When clicking on the title bar outside of tabs, we still focus the selected tab for that node
15251 // FIXME: TabItem use AllowItemOverlap so we manually perform a more specific test for now (hovered || held)
15252 ImGuiID title_bar_id = host_window->GetID("#TITLEBAR");
15253 if (g.HoveredId == 0 || g.HoveredId == title_bar_id || g.ActiveId == title_bar_id)
15254 {
15255 bool held;
15256 ButtonBehavior(title_bar_rect, title_bar_id, NULL, &held, ImGuiButtonFlags_AllowItemOverlap);
15257 if (g.HoveredId == title_bar_id)
15258 {
15259 // ImGuiButtonFlags_AllowItemOverlap + SetItemAllowOverlap() required for appending into dock node tab bar,
15260 // otherwise dragging window will steal HoveredId and amended tabs cannot get them.
15261 g.LastItemData.ID = title_bar_id;
15262 SetItemAllowOverlap();
15263 }
15264 if (held)
15265 {
15266 if (IsMouseClicked(0))
15267 focus_tab_id = tab_bar->SelectedTabId;
15268
15269 // Forward moving request to selected window
15270 if (ImGuiTabItem* tab = TabBarFindTabByID(tab_bar, tab_bar->SelectedTabId))
15271 StartMouseMovingWindowOrNode(tab->Window ? tab->Window : node->HostWindow, node, false);
15272 }
15273 }
15274
15275 // Forward focus from host node to selected window
15276 //if (is_focused && g.NavWindow == host_window && !g.NavWindowingTarget)
15277 // focus_tab_id = tab_bar->SelectedTabId;
15278
15279 // When clicked on a tab we requested focus to the docked child
15280 // This overrides the value set by "forward focus from host node to selected window".
15281 if (tab_bar->NextSelectedTabId)
15282 focus_tab_id = tab_bar->NextSelectedTabId;
15283
15284 // Apply navigation focus
15285 if (focus_tab_id != 0)
15286 if (ImGuiTabItem* tab = TabBarFindTabByID(tab_bar, focus_tab_id))
15287 if (tab->Window)
15288 {
15289 FocusWindow(tab->Window);
15290 NavInitWindow(tab->Window, false);
15291 }
15292
15293 EndTabBar();
15294 PopID();
15295
15296 // Restore SkipItems flag
15297 if (!node->IsDockSpace())
15298 {
15299 host_window->DC.NavLayerCurrent = ImGuiNavLayer_Main;
15300 host_window->SkipItems = backup_skip_item;
15301 }
15302}
15303
15304static void ImGui::DockNodeAddTabBar(ImGuiDockNode* node)
15305{
15306 IM_ASSERT(node->TabBar == NULL);
15307 node->TabBar = IM_NEW(ImGuiTabBar);
15308}
15309
15310static void ImGui::DockNodeRemoveTabBar(ImGuiDockNode* node)
15311{
15312 if (node->TabBar == NULL)
15313 return;
15314 IM_DELETE(node->TabBar);
15315 node->TabBar = NULL;
15316}
15317
15318static bool DockNodeIsDropAllowedOne(ImGuiWindow* payload, ImGuiWindow* host_window)
15319{
15320 if (host_window->DockNodeAsHost && host_window->DockNodeAsHost->IsDockSpace() && payload->BeginOrderWithinContext < host_window->BeginOrderWithinContext)
15321 return false;
15322
15323 ImGuiWindowClass* host_class = host_window->DockNodeAsHost ? &host_window->DockNodeAsHost->WindowClass : &host_window->WindowClass;
15324 ImGuiWindowClass* payload_class = &payload->WindowClass;
15325 if (host_class->ClassId != payload_class->ClassId)
15326 {
15327 if (host_class->ClassId != 0 && host_class->DockingAllowUnclassed && payload_class->ClassId == 0)
15328 return true;
15329 if (payload_class->ClassId != 0 && payload_class->DockingAllowUnclassed && host_class->ClassId == 0)
15330 return true;
15331 return false;
15332 }
15333
15334 // Prevent docking any window created above a popup
15335 // Technically we should support it (e.g. in the case of a long-lived modal window that had fancy docking features),
15336 // by e.g. adding a 'if (!ImGui::IsWindowWithinBeginStackOf(host_window, popup_window))' test.
15337 // But it would requires more work on our end because the dock host windows is technically created in NewFrame()
15338 // and our ->ParentXXX and ->RootXXX pointers inside windows are currently mislading or lacking.
15339 ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
15340 for (int i = g.OpenPopupStack.Size - 1; i >= 0; i--)
15341 if (ImGuiWindow* popup_window = g.OpenPopupStack[i].Window)
15342 if (ImGui::IsWindowWithinBeginStackOf(payload, popup_window)) // Payload is created from within a popup begin stack.
15343 return false;
15344
15345 return true;
15346}
15347
15348static bool ImGui::DockNodeIsDropAllowed(ImGuiWindow* host_window, ImGuiWindow* root_payload)
15349{
15350 if (root_payload->DockNodeAsHost && root_payload->DockNodeAsHost->IsSplitNode()) // FIXME-DOCK: Missing filtering
15351 return true;
15352
15353 const int payload_count = root_payload->DockNodeAsHost ? root_payload->DockNodeAsHost->Windows.Size : 1;
15354 for (int payload_n = 0; payload_n < payload_count; payload_n++)
15355 {
15356 ImGuiWindow* payload = root_payload->DockNodeAsHost ? root_payload->DockNodeAsHost->Windows[payload_n] : root_payload;
15357 if (DockNodeIsDropAllowedOne(payload, host_window))
15358 return true;
15359 }
15360 return false;
15361}
15362
15363// window menu button == collapse button when not in a dock node.
15364// FIXME: This is similar to RenderWindowTitleBarContents(), may want to share code.
15365static void ImGui::DockNodeCalcTabBarLayout(const ImGuiDockNode* node, ImRect* out_title_rect, ImRect* out_tab_bar_rect, ImVec2* out_window_menu_button_pos, ImVec2* out_close_button_pos)
15366{
15367 ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
15368 ImGuiStyle& style = g.Style;
15369
15370 ImRect r = ImRect(node->Pos.x, node->Pos.y, node->Pos.x + node->Size.x, node->Pos.y + g.FontSize + g.Style.FramePadding.y * 2.0f);
15371 if (out_title_rect) { *out_title_rect = r; }
15372
15373 r.Min.x += style.WindowBorderSize;
15374 r.Max.x -= style.WindowBorderSize;
15375
15376 float button_sz = g.FontSize;
15377
15378 ImVec2 window_menu_button_pos = r.Min;
15379 r.Min.x += style.FramePadding.x;
15380 r.Max.x -= style.FramePadding.x;
15381 if (node->HasCloseButton)
15382 {
15383 r.Max.x -= button_sz;
15384 if (out_close_button_pos) *out_close_button_pos = ImVec2(r.Max.x - style.FramePadding.x, r.Min.y);
15385 }
15386 if (node->HasWindowMenuButton && style.WindowMenuButtonPosition == ImGuiDir_Left)
15387 {
15388 r.Min.x += button_sz + style.ItemInnerSpacing.x;
15389 }
15390 else if (node->HasWindowMenuButton && style.WindowMenuButtonPosition == ImGuiDir_Right)
15391 {
15392 r.Max.x -= button_sz + style.FramePadding.x;
15393 window_menu_button_pos = ImVec2(r.Max.x, r.Min.y);
15394 }
15395 if (out_tab_bar_rect) { *out_tab_bar_rect = r; }
15396 if (out_window_menu_button_pos) { *out_window_menu_button_pos = window_menu_button_pos; }
15397}
15398
15399void ImGui::DockNodeCalcSplitRects(ImVec2& pos_old, ImVec2& size_old, ImVec2& pos_new, ImVec2& size_new, ImGuiDir dir, ImVec2 size_new_desired)
15400{
15401 ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
15402 const float dock_spacing = g.Style.ItemInnerSpacing.x;
15403 const ImGuiAxis axis = (dir == ImGuiDir_Left || dir == ImGuiDir_Right) ? ImGuiAxis_X : ImGuiAxis_Y;
15404 pos_new[axis ^ 1] = pos_old[axis ^ 1];
15405 size_new[axis ^ 1] = size_old[axis ^ 1];
15406
15407 // Distribute size on given axis (with a desired size or equally)
15408 const float w_avail = size_old[axis] - dock_spacing;
15409 if (size_new_desired[axis] > 0.0f && size_new_desired[axis] <= w_avail * 0.5f)
15410 {
15411 size_new[axis] = size_new_desired[axis];
15412 size_old[axis] = IM_FLOOR(w_avail - size_new[axis]);
15413 }
15414 else
15415 {
15416 size_new[axis] = IM_FLOOR(w_avail * 0.5f);
15417 size_old[axis] = IM_FLOOR(w_avail - size_new[axis]);
15418 }
15419
15420 // Position each node
15421 if (dir == ImGuiDir_Right || dir == ImGuiDir_Down)
15422 {
15423 pos_new[axis] = pos_old[axis] + size_old[axis] + dock_spacing;
15424 }
15425 else if (dir == ImGuiDir_Left || dir == ImGuiDir_Up)
15426 {
15427 pos_new[axis] = pos_old[axis];
15428 pos_old[axis] = pos_new[axis] + size_new[axis] + dock_spacing;
15429 }
15430}
15431
15432// Retrieve the drop rectangles for a given direction or for the center + perform hit testing.
15433bool ImGui::DockNodeCalcDropRectsAndTestMousePos(const ImRect& parent, ImGuiDir dir, ImRect& out_r, bool outer_docking, ImVec2* test_mouse_pos)
15434{
15435 ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
15436
15437 const float parent_smaller_axis = ImMin(parent.GetWidth(), parent.GetHeight());
15438 const float hs_for_central_nodes = ImMin(g.FontSize * 1.5f, ImMax(g.FontSize * 0.5f, parent_smaller_axis / 8.0f));
15439 float hs_w; // Half-size, longer axis
15440 float hs_h; // Half-size, smaller axis
15441 ImVec2 off; // Distance from edge or center
15442 if (outer_docking)
15443 {
15444 //hs_w = ImFloor(ImClamp(parent_smaller_axis - hs_for_central_nodes * 4.0f, g.FontSize * 0.5f, g.FontSize * 8.0f));
15445 //hs_h = ImFloor(hs_w * 0.15f);
15446 //off = ImVec2(ImFloor(parent.GetWidth() * 0.5f - GetFrameHeightWithSpacing() * 1.4f - hs_h), ImFloor(parent.GetHeight() * 0.5f - GetFrameHeightWithSpacing() * 1.4f - hs_h));
15447 hs_w = ImFloor(hs_for_central_nodes * 1.50f);
15448 hs_h = ImFloor(hs_for_central_nodes * 0.80f);
15449 off = ImVec2(ImFloor(parent.GetWidth() * 0.5f - hs_h), ImFloor(parent.GetHeight() * 0.5f - hs_h));
15450 }
15451 else
15452 {
15453 hs_w = ImFloor(hs_for_central_nodes);
15454 hs_h = ImFloor(hs_for_central_nodes * 0.90f);
15455 off = ImVec2(ImFloor(hs_w * 2.40f), ImFloor(hs_w * 2.40f));
15456 }
15457
15458 ImVec2 c = ImFloor(parent.GetCenter());
15459 if (dir == ImGuiDir_None) { out_r = ImRect(c.x - hs_w, c.y - hs_w, c.x + hs_w, c.y + hs_w); }
15460 else if (dir == ImGuiDir_Up) { out_r = ImRect(c.x - hs_w, c.y - off.y - hs_h, c.x + hs_w, c.y - off.y + hs_h); }
15461 else if (dir == ImGuiDir_Down) { out_r = ImRect(c.x - hs_w, c.y + off.y - hs_h, c.x + hs_w, c.y + off.y + hs_h); }
15462 else if (dir == ImGuiDir_Left) { out_r = ImRect(c.x - off.x - hs_h, c.y - hs_w, c.x - off.x + hs_h, c.y + hs_w); }
15463 else if (dir == ImGuiDir_Right) { out_r = ImRect(c.x + off.x - hs_h, c.y - hs_w, c.x + off.x + hs_h, c.y + hs_w); }
15464
15465 if (test_mouse_pos == NULL)
15466 return false;
15467
15468 ImRect hit_r = out_r;
15469 if (!outer_docking)
15470 {
15471 // Custom hit testing for the 5-way selection, designed to reduce flickering when moving diagonally between sides
15472 hit_r.Expand(ImFloor(hs_w * 0.30f));
15473 ImVec2 mouse_delta = (*test_mouse_pos - c);
15474 float mouse_delta_len2 = ImLengthSqr(mouse_delta);
15475 float r_threshold_center = hs_w * 1.4f;
15476 float r_threshold_sides = hs_w * (1.4f + 1.2f);
15477 if (mouse_delta_len2 < r_threshold_center * r_threshold_center)
15478 return (dir == ImGuiDir_None);
15479 if (mouse_delta_len2 < r_threshold_sides * r_threshold_sides)
15480 return (dir == ImGetDirQuadrantFromDelta(mouse_delta.x, mouse_delta.y));
15481 }
15482 return hit_r.Contains(*test_mouse_pos);
15483}
15484
15485// host_node may be NULL if the window doesn't have a DockNode already.
15486// FIXME-DOCK: This is misnamed since it's also doing the filtering.
15487static void ImGui::DockNodePreviewDockSetup(ImGuiWindow* host_window, ImGuiDockNode* host_node, ImGuiWindow* root_payload, ImGuiDockPreviewData* data, bool is_explicit_target, bool is_outer_docking)
15488{
15489 ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
15490
15491 // There is an edge case when docking into a dockspace which only has inactive nodes.
15492 // In this case DockNodeTreeFindNodeByPos() will have selected a leaf node which is inactive.
15493 // Because the inactive leaf node doesn't have proper pos/size yet, we'll use the root node as reference.
15494 ImGuiDockNode* root_payload_as_host = root_payload->DockNodeAsHost;
15495 ImGuiDockNode* ref_node_for_rect = (host_node && !host_node->IsVisible) ? DockNodeGetRootNode(host_node) : host_node;
15496 if (ref_node_for_rect)
15497 IM_ASSERT(ref_node_for_rect->IsVisible);
15498
15499 // Filter, figure out where we are allowed to dock
15500 ImGuiDockNodeFlags src_node_flags = root_payload_as_host ? root_payload_as_host->MergedFlags : root_payload->WindowClass.DockNodeFlagsOverrideSet;
15501 ImGuiDockNodeFlags dst_node_flags = host_node ? host_node->MergedFlags : host_window->WindowClass.DockNodeFlagsOverrideSet;
15502 data->IsCenterAvailable = true;
15503 if (is_outer_docking)
15504 data->IsCenterAvailable = false;
15505 else if (dst_node_flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoDocking)
15506 data->IsCenterAvailable = false;
15507 else if (host_node && (dst_node_flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoDockingInCentralNode) && host_node->IsCentralNode())
15508 data->IsCenterAvailable = false;
15509 else if ((!host_node || !host_node->IsEmpty()) && root_payload_as_host && root_payload_as_host->IsSplitNode() && (root_payload_as_host->OnlyNodeWithWindows == NULL)) // Is _visibly_ split?
15510 data->IsCenterAvailable = false;
15511 else if (dst_node_flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoDockingOverMe)
15512 data->IsCenterAvailable = false;
15513 else if ((src_node_flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoDockingOverOther) && (!host_node || !host_node->IsEmpty()))
15514 data->IsCenterAvailable = false;
15515 else if ((src_node_flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoDockingOverEmpty) && host_node && host_node->IsEmpty())
15516 data->IsCenterAvailable = false;
15517
15518 data->IsSidesAvailable = true;
15519 if ((dst_node_flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoSplit) || g.IO.ConfigDockingNoSplit)
15520 data->IsSidesAvailable = false;
15521 else if (!is_outer_docking && host_node && host_node->ParentNode == NULL && host_node->IsCentralNode())
15522 data->IsSidesAvailable = false;
15523 else if ((dst_node_flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoDockingSplitMe) || (src_node_flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoDockingSplitOther))
15524 data->IsSidesAvailable = false;
15525
15526 // Build a tentative future node (reuse same structure because it is practical. Shape will be readjusted when previewing a split)
15527 data->FutureNode.HasCloseButton = (host_node ? host_node->HasCloseButton : host_window->HasCloseButton) || (root_payload->HasCloseButton);
15528 data->FutureNode.HasWindowMenuButton = host_node ? true : ((host_window->Flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_NoCollapse) == 0);
15529 data->FutureNode.Pos = ref_node_for_rect ? ref_node_for_rect->Pos : host_window->Pos;
15530 data->FutureNode.Size = ref_node_for_rect ? ref_node_for_rect->Size : host_window->Size;
15531
15532 // Calculate drop shapes geometry for allowed splitting directions
15533 IM_ASSERT(ImGuiDir_None == -1);
15534 data->SplitNode = host_node;
15535 data->SplitDir = ImGuiDir_None;
15536 data->IsSplitDirExplicit = false;
15537 if (!host_window->Collapsed)
15538 for (int dir = ImGuiDir_None; dir < ImGuiDir_COUNT; dir++)
15539 {
15540 if (dir == ImGuiDir_None && !data->IsCenterAvailable)
15541 continue;
15542 if (dir != ImGuiDir_None && !data->IsSidesAvailable)
15543 continue;
15544 if (DockNodeCalcDropRectsAndTestMousePos(data->FutureNode.Rect(), (ImGuiDir)dir, data->DropRectsDraw[dir+1], is_outer_docking, &g.IO.MousePos))
15545 {
15546 data->SplitDir = (ImGuiDir)dir;
15547 data->IsSplitDirExplicit = true;
15548 }
15549 }
15550
15551 // When docking without holding Shift, we only allow and preview docking when hovering over a drop rect or over the title bar
15552 data->IsDropAllowed = (data->SplitDir != ImGuiDir_None) || (data->IsCenterAvailable);
15553 if (!is_explicit_target && !data->IsSplitDirExplicit && !g.IO.ConfigDockingWithShift)
15554 data->IsDropAllowed = false;
15555
15556 // Calculate split area
15557 data->SplitRatio = 0.0f;
15558 if (data->SplitDir != ImGuiDir_None)
15559 {
15560 ImGuiDir split_dir = data->SplitDir;
15561 ImGuiAxis split_axis = (split_dir == ImGuiDir_Left || split_dir == ImGuiDir_Right) ? ImGuiAxis_X : ImGuiAxis_Y;
15562 ImVec2 pos_new, pos_old = data->FutureNode.Pos;
15563 ImVec2 size_new, size_old = data->FutureNode.Size;
15564 DockNodeCalcSplitRects(pos_old, size_old, pos_new, size_new, split_dir, root_payload->Size);
15565
15566 // Calculate split ratio so we can pass it down the docking request
15567 float split_ratio = ImSaturate(size_new[split_axis] / data->FutureNode.Size[split_axis]);
15568 data->FutureNode.Pos = pos_new;
15569 data->FutureNode.Size = size_new;
15570 data->SplitRatio = (split_dir == ImGuiDir_Right || split_dir == ImGuiDir_Down) ? (1.0f - split_ratio) : (split_ratio);
15571 }
15572}
15573
15574static void ImGui::DockNodePreviewDockRender(ImGuiWindow* host_window, ImGuiDockNode* host_node, ImGuiWindow* root_payload, const ImGuiDockPreviewData* data)
15575{
15576 ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
15577 IM_ASSERT(g.CurrentWindow == host_window); // Because we rely on font size to calculate tab sizes
15578
15579 // With this option, we only display the preview on the target viewport, and the payload viewport is made transparent.
15580 // To compensate for the single layer obstructed by the payload, we'll increase the alpha of the preview nodes.
15581 const bool is_transparent_payload = g.IO.ConfigDockingTransparentPayload;
15582
15583 // In case the two windows involved are on different viewports, we will draw the overlay on each of them.
15584 int overlay_draw_lists_count = 0;
15585 ImDrawList* overlay_draw_lists[2];
15586 overlay_draw_lists[overlay_draw_lists_count++] = GetForegroundDrawList(host_window->Viewport);
15587 if (host_window->Viewport != root_payload->Viewport && !is_transparent_payload)
15588 overlay_draw_lists[overlay_draw_lists_count++] = GetForegroundDrawList(root_payload->Viewport);
15589
15590 // Draw main preview rectangle
15591 const ImU32 overlay_col_main = GetColorU32(ImGuiCol_DockingPreview, is_transparent_payload ? 0.60f : 0.40f);
15592 const ImU32 overlay_col_drop = GetColorU32(ImGuiCol_DockingPreview, is_transparent_payload ? 0.90f : 0.70f);
15593 const ImU32 overlay_col_drop_hovered = GetColorU32(ImGuiCol_DockingPreview, is_transparent_payload ? 1.20f : 1.00f);
15594 const ImU32 overlay_col_lines = GetColorU32(ImGuiCol_NavWindowingHighlight, is_transparent_payload ? 0.80f : 0.60f);
15595
15596 // Display area preview
15597 const bool can_preview_tabs = (root_payload->DockNodeAsHost == NULL || root_payload->DockNodeAsHost->Windows.Size > 0);
15598 if (data->IsDropAllowed)
15599 {
15600 ImRect overlay_rect = data->FutureNode.Rect();
15601 if (data->SplitDir == ImGuiDir_None && can_preview_tabs)
15602 overlay_rect.Min.y += GetFrameHeight();
15603 if (data->SplitDir != ImGuiDir_None || data->IsCenterAvailable)
15604 for (int overlay_n = 0; overlay_n < overlay_draw_lists_count; overlay_n++)
15605 overlay_draw_lists[overlay_n]->AddRectFilled(overlay_rect.Min, overlay_rect.Max, overlay_col_main, host_window->WindowRounding, CalcRoundingFlagsForRectInRect(overlay_rect, host_window->Rect(), DOCKING_SPLITTER_SIZE));
15606 }
15607
15608 // Display tab shape/label preview unless we are splitting node (it generally makes the situation harder to read)
15609 if (data->IsDropAllowed && can_preview_tabs && data->SplitDir == ImGuiDir_None && data->IsCenterAvailable)
15610 {
15611 // Compute target tab bar geometry so we can locate our preview tabs
15612 ImRect tab_bar_rect;
15613 DockNodeCalcTabBarLayout(&data->FutureNode, NULL, &tab_bar_rect, NULL, NULL);
15614 ImVec2 tab_pos = tab_bar_rect.Min;
15615 if (host_node && host_node->TabBar)
15616 {
15617 if (!host_node->IsHiddenTabBar() && !host_node->IsNoTabBar())
15618 tab_pos.x += host_node->TabBar->WidthAllTabs + g.Style.ItemInnerSpacing.x; // We don't use OffsetNewTab because when using non-persistent-order tab bar it is incremented with each Tab submission.
15619 else
15620 tab_pos.x += g.Style.ItemInnerSpacing.x + TabItemCalcSize(host_node->Windows[0]->Name, host_node->Windows[0]->HasCloseButton).x;
15621 }
15622 else if (!(host_window->Flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_DockNodeHost))
15623 {
15624 tab_pos.x += g.Style.ItemInnerSpacing.x + TabItemCalcSize(host_window->Name, host_window->HasCloseButton).x; // Account for slight offset which will be added when changing from title bar to tab bar
15625 }
15626
15627 // Draw tab shape/label preview (payload may be a loose window or a host window carrying multiple tabbed windows)
15628 if (root_payload->DockNodeAsHost)
15629 IM_ASSERT(root_payload->DockNodeAsHost->Windows.Size <= root_payload->DockNodeAsHost->TabBar->Tabs.Size);
15630 ImGuiTabBar* tab_bar_with_payload = root_payload->DockNodeAsHost ? root_payload->DockNodeAsHost->TabBar : NULL;
15631 const int payload_count = tab_bar_with_payload ? tab_bar_with_payload->Tabs.Size : 1;
15632 for (int payload_n = 0; payload_n < payload_count; payload_n++)
15633 {
15634 // DockNode's TabBar may have non-window Tabs manually appended by user
15635 ImGuiWindow* payload_window = tab_bar_with_payload ? tab_bar_with_payload->Tabs[payload_n].Window : root_payload;
15636 if (tab_bar_with_payload && payload_window == NULL)
15637 continue;
15638 if (!DockNodeIsDropAllowedOne(payload_window, host_window))
15639 continue;
15640
15641 // Calculate the tab bounding box for each payload window
15642 ImVec2 tab_size = TabItemCalcSize(payload_window->Name, payload_window->HasCloseButton);
15643 ImRect tab_bb(tab_pos.x, tab_pos.y, tab_pos.x + tab_size.x, tab_pos.y + tab_size.y);
15644 tab_pos.x += tab_size.x + g.Style.ItemInnerSpacing.x;
15645 const ImU32 overlay_col_text = GetColorU32(payload_window->DockStyle.Colors[ImGuiWindowDockStyleCol_Text]);
15646 const ImU32 overlay_col_tabs = GetColorU32(payload_window->DockStyle.Colors[ImGuiWindowDockStyleCol_TabActive]);
15647 PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_Text, overlay_col_text);
15648 for (int overlay_n = 0; overlay_n < overlay_draw_lists_count; overlay_n++)
15649 {
15650 ImGuiTabItemFlags tab_flags = ImGuiTabItemFlags_Preview | ((payload_window->Flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_UnsavedDocument) ? ImGuiTabItemFlags_UnsavedDocument : 0);
15651 if (!tab_bar_rect.Contains(tab_bb))
15652 overlay_draw_lists[overlay_n]->PushClipRect(tab_bar_rect.Min, tab_bar_rect.Max);
15653 TabItemBackground(overlay_draw_lists[overlay_n], tab_bb, tab_flags, overlay_col_tabs);
15654 TabItemLabelAndCloseButton(overlay_draw_lists[overlay_n], tab_bb, tab_flags, g.Style.FramePadding, payload_window->Name, 0, 0, false, NULL, NULL);
15655 if (!tab_bar_rect.Contains(tab_bb))
15656 overlay_draw_lists[overlay_n]->PopClipRect();
15657 }
15658 PopStyleColor();
15659 }
15660 }
15661
15662 // Display drop boxes
15663 const float overlay_rounding = ImMax(3.0f, g.Style.FrameRounding);
15664 for (int dir = ImGuiDir_None; dir < ImGuiDir_COUNT; dir++)
15665 {
15666 if (!data->DropRectsDraw[dir + 1].IsInverted())
15667 {
15668 ImRect draw_r = data->DropRectsDraw[dir + 1];
15669 ImRect draw_r_in = draw_r;
15670 draw_r_in.Expand(-2.0f);
15671 ImU32 overlay_col = (data->SplitDir == (ImGuiDir)dir && data->IsSplitDirExplicit) ? overlay_col_drop_hovered : overlay_col_drop;
15672 for (int overlay_n = 0; overlay_n < overlay_draw_lists_count; overlay_n++)
15673 {
15674 ImVec2 center = ImFloor(draw_r_in.GetCenter());
15675 overlay_draw_lists[overlay_n]->AddRectFilled(draw_r.Min, draw_r.Max, overlay_col, overlay_rounding);
15676 overlay_draw_lists[overlay_n]->AddRect(draw_r_in.Min, draw_r_in.Max, overlay_col_lines, overlay_rounding);
15677 if (dir == ImGuiDir_Left || dir == ImGuiDir_Right)
15678 overlay_draw_lists[overlay_n]->AddLine(ImVec2(center.x, draw_r_in.Min.y), ImVec2(center.x, draw_r_in.Max.y), overlay_col_lines);
15679 if (dir == ImGuiDir_Up || dir == ImGuiDir_Down)
15680 overlay_draw_lists[overlay_n]->AddLine(ImVec2(draw_r_in.Min.x, center.y), ImVec2(draw_r_in.Max.x, center.y), overlay_col_lines);
15681 }
15682 }
15683
15684 // Stop after ImGuiDir_None
15685 if ((host_node && (host_node->MergedFlags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoSplit)) || g.IO.ConfigDockingNoSplit)
15686 return;
15687 }
15688}
15689
15690//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
15691// Docking: ImGuiDockNode Tree manipulation functions
15692//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
15693// - DockNodeTreeSplit()
15694// - DockNodeTreeMerge()
15695// - DockNodeTreeUpdatePosSize()
15696// - DockNodeTreeUpdateSplitterFindTouchingNode()
15697// - DockNodeTreeUpdateSplitter()
15698// - DockNodeTreeFindFallbackLeafNode()
15699// - DockNodeTreeFindNodeByPos()
15700//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
15701
15702void ImGui::DockNodeTreeSplit(ImGuiContext* ctx, ImGuiDockNode* parent_node, ImGuiAxis split_axis, int split_inheritor_child_idx, float split_ratio, ImGuiDockNode* new_node)
15703{
15704 ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
15705 IM_ASSERT(split_axis != ImGuiAxis_None);
15706
15707 ImGuiDockNode* child_0 = (new_node && split_inheritor_child_idx != 0) ? new_node : DockContextAddNode(ctx, 0);
15708 child_0->ParentNode = parent_node;
15709
15710 ImGuiDockNode* child_1 = (new_node && split_inheritor_child_idx != 1) ? new_node : DockContextAddNode(ctx, 0);
15711 child_1->ParentNode = parent_node;
15712
15713 ImGuiDockNode* child_inheritor = (split_inheritor_child_idx == 0) ? child_0 : child_1;
15714 DockNodeMoveChildNodes(child_inheritor, parent_node);
15715 parent_node->ChildNodes[0] = child_0;
15716 parent_node->ChildNodes[1] = child_1;
15717 parent_node->ChildNodes[split_inheritor_child_idx]->VisibleWindow = parent_node->VisibleWindow;
15718 parent_node->SplitAxis = split_axis;
15719 parent_node->VisibleWindow = NULL;
15720 parent_node->AuthorityForPos = parent_node->AuthorityForSize = ImGuiDataAuthority_DockNode;
15721
15722 float size_avail = (parent_node->Size[split_axis] - DOCKING_SPLITTER_SIZE);
15723 size_avail = ImMax(size_avail, g.Style.WindowMinSize[split_axis] * 2.0f);
15724 IM_ASSERT(size_avail > 0.0f); // If you created a node manually with DockBuilderAddNode(), you need to also call DockBuilderSetNodeSize() before splitting.
15725 child_0->SizeRef = child_1->SizeRef = parent_node->Size;
15726 child_0->SizeRef[split_axis] = ImFloor(size_avail * split_ratio);
15727 child_1->SizeRef[split_axis] = ImFloor(size_avail - child_0->SizeRef[split_axis]);
15728
15729 DockNodeMoveWindows(parent_node->ChildNodes[split_inheritor_child_idx], parent_node);
15730 DockSettingsRenameNodeReferences(parent_node->ID, parent_node->ChildNodes[split_inheritor_child_idx]->ID);
15731 DockNodeUpdateHasCentralNodeChild(DockNodeGetRootNode(parent_node));
15732 DockNodeTreeUpdatePosSize(parent_node, parent_node->Pos, parent_node->Size);
15733
15734 // Flags transfer (e.g. this is where we transfer the ImGuiDockNodeFlags_CentralNode property)
15735 child_0->SharedFlags = parent_node->SharedFlags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_SharedFlagsInheritMask_;
15736 child_1->SharedFlags = parent_node->SharedFlags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_SharedFlagsInheritMask_;
15737 child_inheritor->LocalFlags = parent_node->LocalFlags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_LocalFlagsTransferMask_;
15738 parent_node->LocalFlags &= ~ImGuiDockNodeFlags_LocalFlagsTransferMask_;
15739 child_0->UpdateMergedFlags();
15740 child_1->UpdateMergedFlags();
15741 parent_node->UpdateMergedFlags();
15742 if (child_inheritor->IsCentralNode())
15743 DockNodeGetRootNode(parent_node)->CentralNode = child_inheritor;
15744}
15745
15746void ImGui::DockNodeTreeMerge(ImGuiContext* ctx, ImGuiDockNode* parent_node, ImGuiDockNode* merge_lead_child)
15747{
15748 // When called from DockContextProcessUndockNode() it is possible that one of the child is NULL.
15749 ImGuiDockNode* child_0 = parent_node->ChildNodes[0];
15750 ImGuiDockNode* child_1 = parent_node->ChildNodes[1];
15751 IM_ASSERT(child_0 || child_1);
15752 IM_ASSERT(merge_lead_child == child_0 || merge_lead_child == child_1);
15753 if ((child_0 && child_0->Windows.Size > 0) || (child_1 && child_1->Windows.Size > 0))
15754 {
15755 IM_ASSERT(parent_node->TabBar == NULL);
15756 IM_ASSERT(parent_node->Windows.Size == 0);
15757 }
15758 IMGUI_DEBUG_LOG_DOCKING("DockNodeTreeMerge 0x%08X & 0x%08X back into parent 0x%08X\n", child_0 ? child_0->ID : 0, child_1 ? child_1->ID : 0, parent_node->ID);
15759
15760 ImVec2 backup_last_explicit_size = parent_node->SizeRef;
15761 DockNodeMoveChildNodes(parent_node, merge_lead_child);
15762 if (child_0)
15763 {
15764 DockNodeMoveWindows(parent_node, child_0); // Generally only 1 of the 2 child node will have windows
15765 DockSettingsRenameNodeReferences(child_0->ID, parent_node->ID);
15766 }
15767 if (child_1)
15768 {
15769 DockNodeMoveWindows(parent_node, child_1);
15770 DockSettingsRenameNodeReferences(child_1->ID, parent_node->ID);
15771 }
15772 DockNodeApplyPosSizeToWindows(parent_node);
15773 parent_node->AuthorityForPos = parent_node->AuthorityForSize = parent_node->AuthorityForViewport = ImGuiDataAuthority_Auto;
15774 parent_node->VisibleWindow = merge_lead_child->VisibleWindow;
15775 parent_node->SizeRef = backup_last_explicit_size;
15776
15777 // Flags transfer
15778 parent_node->LocalFlags &= ~ImGuiDockNodeFlags_LocalFlagsTransferMask_; // Preserve Dockspace flag
15779 parent_node->LocalFlags |= (child_0 ? child_0->LocalFlags : 0) & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_LocalFlagsTransferMask_;
15780 parent_node->LocalFlags |= (child_1 ? child_1->LocalFlags : 0) & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_LocalFlagsTransferMask_;
15781 parent_node->LocalFlagsInWindows = (child_0 ? child_0->LocalFlagsInWindows : 0) | (child_1 ? child_1->LocalFlagsInWindows : 0); // FIXME: Would be more consistent to update from actual windows
15782 parent_node->UpdateMergedFlags();
15783
15784 if (child_0)
15785 {
15786 ctx->DockContext.Nodes.SetVoidPtr(child_0->ID, NULL);
15787 IM_DELETE(child_0);
15788 }
15789 if (child_1)
15790 {
15791 ctx->DockContext.Nodes.SetVoidPtr(child_1->ID, NULL);
15792 IM_DELETE(child_1);
15793 }
15794}
15795
15796// Update Pos/Size for a node hierarchy (don't affect child Windows yet)
15797// (Depth-first, Pre-Order)
15798void ImGui::DockNodeTreeUpdatePosSize(ImGuiDockNode* node, ImVec2 pos, ImVec2 size, ImGuiDockNode* only_write_to_single_node)
15799{
15800 // During the regular dock node update we write to all nodes.
15801 // 'only_write_to_single_node' is only set when turning a node visible mid-frame and we need its size right-away.
15802 const bool write_to_node = only_write_to_single_node == NULL || only_write_to_single_node == node;
15803 if (write_to_node)
15804 {
15805 node->Pos = pos;
15806 node->Size = size;
15807 }
15808
15809 if (node->IsLeafNode())
15810 return;
15811
15812 ImGuiDockNode* child_0 = node->ChildNodes[0];
15813 ImGuiDockNode* child_1 = node->ChildNodes[1];
15814 ImVec2 child_0_pos = pos, child_1_pos = pos;
15815 ImVec2 child_0_size = size, child_1_size = size;
15816
15817 const bool child_0_is_toward_single_node = (only_write_to_single_node != NULL && DockNodeIsInHierarchyOf(only_write_to_single_node, child_0));
15818 const bool child_1_is_toward_single_node = (only_write_to_single_node != NULL && DockNodeIsInHierarchyOf(only_write_to_single_node, child_1));
15819 const bool child_0_is_or_will_be_visible = child_0->IsVisible || child_0_is_toward_single_node;
15820 const bool child_1_is_or_will_be_visible = child_1->IsVisible || child_1_is_toward_single_node;
15821
15822 if (child_0_is_or_will_be_visible && child_1_is_or_will_be_visible)
15823 {
15824 ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
15825 const float spacing = DOCKING_SPLITTER_SIZE;
15826 const ImGuiAxis axis = (ImGuiAxis)node->SplitAxis;
15827 const float size_avail = ImMax(size[axis] - spacing, 0.0f);
15828
15829 // Size allocation policy
15830 // 1) The first 0..WindowMinSize[axis]*2 are allocated evenly to both windows.
15831 const float size_min_each = ImFloor(ImMin(size_avail, g.Style.WindowMinSize[axis] * 2.0f) * 0.5f);
15832
15833 // FIXME: Blocks 2) and 3) are essentially doing nearly the same thing.
15834 // Difference are: write-back to SizeRef; application of a minimum size; rounding before ImFloor()
15835 // Clarify and rework differences between Size & SizeRef and purpose of WantLockSizeOnce
15836
15837 // 2) Process locked absolute size (during a splitter resize we preserve the child of nodes not touching the splitter edge)
15838 if (child_0->WantLockSizeOnce && !child_1->WantLockSizeOnce)
15839 {
15840 child_0_size[axis] = child_0->SizeRef[axis] = ImMin(size_avail - 1.0f, child_0->Size[axis]);
15841 child_1_size[axis] = child_1->SizeRef[axis] = (size_avail - child_0_size[axis]);
15842 IM_ASSERT(child_0->SizeRef[axis] > 0.0f && child_1->SizeRef[axis] > 0.0f);
15843 }
15844 else if (child_1->WantLockSizeOnce && !child_0->WantLockSizeOnce)
15845 {
15846 child_1_size[axis] = child_1->SizeRef[axis] = ImMin(size_avail - 1.0f, child_1->Size[axis]);
15847 child_0_size[axis] = child_0->SizeRef[axis] = (size_avail - child_1_size[axis]);
15848 IM_ASSERT(child_0->SizeRef[axis] > 0.0f && child_1->SizeRef[axis] > 0.0f);
15849 }
15850 else if (child_0->WantLockSizeOnce && child_1->WantLockSizeOnce)
15851 {
15852 // FIXME-DOCK: We cannot honor the requested size, so apply ratio.
15853 // Currently this path will only be taken if code programmatically sets WantLockSizeOnce
15854 float split_ratio = child_0_size[axis] / (child_0_size[axis] + child_1_size[axis]);
15855 child_0_size[axis] = child_0->SizeRef[axis] = ImFloor(size_avail * split_ratio);
15856 child_1_size[axis] = child_1->SizeRef[axis] = (size_avail - child_0_size[axis]);
15857 IM_ASSERT(child_0->SizeRef[axis] > 0.0f && child_1->SizeRef[axis] > 0.0f);
15858 }
15859
15860 // 3) If one window is the central node (~ use remaining space, should be made explicit!), use explicit size from the other, and remainder for the central node
15861 else if (child_0->SizeRef[axis] != 0.0f && child_1->HasCentralNodeChild)
15862 {
15863 child_0_size[axis] = ImMin(size_avail - size_min_each, child_0->SizeRef[axis]);
15864 child_1_size[axis] = (size_avail - child_0_size[axis]);
15865 }
15866 else if (child_1->SizeRef[axis] != 0.0f && child_0->HasCentralNodeChild)
15867 {
15868 child_1_size[axis] = ImMin(size_avail - size_min_each, child_1->SizeRef[axis]);
15869 child_0_size[axis] = (size_avail - child_1_size[axis]);
15870 }
15871 else
15872 {
15873 // 4) Otherwise distribute according to the relative ratio of each SizeRef value
15874 float split_ratio = child_0->SizeRef[axis] / (child_0->SizeRef[axis] + child_1->SizeRef[axis]);
15875 child_0_size[axis] = ImMax(size_min_each, ImFloor(size_avail * split_ratio + 0.5f));
15876 child_1_size[axis] = (size_avail - child_0_size[axis]);
15877 }
15878
15879 child_1_pos[axis] += spacing + child_0_size[axis];
15880 }
15881
15882 if (only_write_to_single_node == NULL)
15883 child_0->WantLockSizeOnce = child_1->WantLockSizeOnce = false;
15884
15885 const bool child_0_recurse = only_write_to_single_node ? child_0_is_toward_single_node : child_0->IsVisible;
15886 const bool child_1_recurse = only_write_to_single_node ? child_1_is_toward_single_node : child_1->IsVisible;
15887 if (child_0_recurse)
15888 DockNodeTreeUpdatePosSize(child_0, child_0_pos, child_0_size);
15889 if (child_1_recurse)
15890 DockNodeTreeUpdatePosSize(child_1, child_1_pos, child_1_size);
15891}
15892
15893static void DockNodeTreeUpdateSplitterFindTouchingNode(ImGuiDockNode* node, ImGuiAxis axis, int side, ImVector<ImGuiDockNode*>* touching_nodes)
15894{
15895 if (node->IsLeafNode())
15896 {
15897 touching_nodes->push_back(node);
15898 return;
15899 }
15900 if (node->ChildNodes[0]->IsVisible)
15901 if (node->SplitAxis != axis || side == 0 || !node->ChildNodes[1]->IsVisible)
15902 DockNodeTreeUpdateSplitterFindTouchingNode(node->ChildNodes[0], axis, side, touching_nodes);
15903 if (node->ChildNodes[1]->IsVisible)
15904 if (node->SplitAxis != axis || side == 1 || !node->ChildNodes[0]->IsVisible)
15905 DockNodeTreeUpdateSplitterFindTouchingNode(node->ChildNodes[1], axis, side, touching_nodes);
15906}
15907
15908// (Depth-First, Pre-Order)
15909void ImGui::DockNodeTreeUpdateSplitter(ImGuiDockNode* node)
15910{
15911 if (node->IsLeafNode())
15912 return;
15913
15914 ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
15915
15916 ImGuiDockNode* child_0 = node->ChildNodes[0];
15917 ImGuiDockNode* child_1 = node->ChildNodes[1];
15918 if (child_0->IsVisible && child_1->IsVisible)
15919 {
15920 // Bounding box of the splitter cover the space between both nodes (w = Spacing, h = Size[xy^1] for when splitting horizontally)
15921 const ImGuiAxis axis = (ImGuiAxis)node->SplitAxis;
15922 IM_ASSERT(axis != ImGuiAxis_None);
15923 ImRect bb;
15924 bb.Min = child_0->Pos;
15925 bb.Max = child_1->Pos;
15926 bb.Min[axis] += child_0->Size[axis];
15927 bb.Max[axis ^ 1] += child_1->Size[axis ^ 1];
15928 //if (g.IO.KeyCtrl) GetForegroundDrawList(g.CurrentWindow->Viewport)->AddRect(bb.Min, bb.Max, IM_COL32(255,0,255,255));
15929
15930 const ImGuiDockNodeFlags merged_flags = child_0->MergedFlags | child_1->MergedFlags; // Merged flags for BOTH childs
15931 const ImGuiDockNodeFlags no_resize_axis_flag = (axis == ImGuiAxis_X) ? ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoResizeX : ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoResizeY;
15932 if ((merged_flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoResize) || (merged_flags & no_resize_axis_flag))
15933 {
15934 ImGuiWindow* window = g.CurrentWindow;
15935 window->DrawList->AddRectFilled(bb.Min, bb.Max, GetColorU32(ImGuiCol_Separator), g.Style.FrameRounding);
15936 }
15937 else
15938 {
15939 //bb.Min[axis] += 1; // Display a little inward so highlight doesn't connect with nearby tabs on the neighbor node.
15940 //bb.Max[axis] -= 1;
15941 PushID(node->ID);
15942
15943 // Find resizing limits by gathering list of nodes that are touching the splitter line.
15944 ImVector<ImGuiDockNode*> touching_nodes[2];
15945 float min_size = g.Style.WindowMinSize[axis];
15946 float resize_limits[2];
15947 resize_limits[0] = node->ChildNodes[0]->Pos[axis] + min_size;
15948 resize_limits[1] = node->ChildNodes[1]->Pos[axis] + node->ChildNodes[1]->Size[axis] - min_size;
15949
15950 ImGuiID splitter_id = GetID("##Splitter");
15951 if (g.ActiveId == splitter_id) // Only process when splitter is active
15952 {
15953 DockNodeTreeUpdateSplitterFindTouchingNode(child_0, axis, 1, &touching_nodes[0]);
15954 DockNodeTreeUpdateSplitterFindTouchingNode(child_1, axis, 0, &touching_nodes[1]);
15955 for (int touching_node_n = 0; touching_node_n < touching_nodes[0].Size; touching_node_n++)
15956 resize_limits[0] = ImMax(resize_limits[0], touching_nodes[0][touching_node_n]->Rect().Min[axis] + min_size);
15957 for (int touching_node_n = 0; touching_node_n < touching_nodes[1].Size; touching_node_n++)
15958 resize_limits[1] = ImMin(resize_limits[1], touching_nodes[1][touching_node_n]->Rect().Max[axis] - min_size);
15959
15960 // [DEBUG] Render touching nodes & limits
15961 /*
15962 ImDrawList* draw_list = node->HostWindow ? GetForegroundDrawList(node->HostWindow) : GetForegroundDrawList(GetMainViewport());
15963 for (int n = 0; n < 2; n++)
15964 {
15965 for (int touching_node_n = 0; touching_node_n < touching_nodes[n].Size; touching_node_n++)
15966 draw_list->AddRect(touching_nodes[n][touching_node_n]->Pos, touching_nodes[n][touching_node_n]->Pos + touching_nodes[n][touching_node_n]->Size, IM_COL32(0, 255, 0, 255));
15967 if (axis == ImGuiAxis_X)
15968 draw_list->AddLine(ImVec2(resize_limits[n], node->ChildNodes[n]->Pos.y), ImVec2(resize_limits[n], node->ChildNodes[n]->Pos.y + node->ChildNodes[n]->Size.y), IM_COL32(255, 0, 255, 255), 3.0f);
15969 else
15970 draw_list->AddLine(ImVec2(node->ChildNodes[n]->Pos.x, resize_limits[n]), ImVec2(node->ChildNodes[n]->Pos.x + node->ChildNodes[n]->Size.x, resize_limits[n]), IM_COL32(255, 0, 255, 255), 3.0f);
15971 }
15972 */
15973 }
15974
15975 // Use a short delay before highlighting the splitter (and changing the mouse cursor) in order for regular mouse movement to not highlight many splitters
15976 float cur_size_0 = child_0->Size[axis];
15977 float cur_size_1 = child_1->Size[axis];
15978 float min_size_0 = resize_limits[0] - child_0->Pos[axis];
15979 float min_size_1 = child_1->Pos[axis] + child_1->Size[axis] - resize_limits[1];
15980 ImU32 bg_col = GetColorU32(ImGuiCol_WindowBg);
15981 if (SplitterBehavior(bb, GetID("##Splitter"), axis, &cur_size_0, &cur_size_1, min_size_0, min_size_1, WINDOWS_HOVER_PADDING, WINDOWS_RESIZE_FROM_EDGES_FEEDBACK_TIMER, bg_col))
15982 {
15983 if (touching_nodes[0].Size > 0 && touching_nodes[1].Size > 0)
15984 {
15985 child_0->Size[axis] = child_0->SizeRef[axis] = cur_size_0;
15986 child_1->Pos[axis] -= cur_size_1 - child_1->Size[axis];
15987 child_1->Size[axis] = child_1->SizeRef[axis] = cur_size_1;
15988
15989 // Lock the size of every node that is a sibling of the node we are touching
15990 // This might be less desirable if we can merge sibling of a same axis into the same parental level.
15991 for (int side_n = 0; side_n < 2; side_n++)
15992 for (int touching_node_n = 0; touching_node_n < touching_nodes[side_n].Size; touching_node_n++)
15993 {
15994 ImGuiDockNode* touching_node = touching_nodes[side_n][touching_node_n];
15995 //ImDrawList* draw_list = node->HostWindow ? GetForegroundDrawList(node->HostWindow) : GetForegroundDrawList(GetMainViewport());
15996 //draw_list->AddRect(touching_node->Pos, touching_node->Pos + touching_node->Size, IM_COL32(255, 128, 0, 255));
15997 while (touching_node->ParentNode != node)
15998 {
15999 if (touching_node->ParentNode->SplitAxis == axis)
16000 {
16001 // Mark other node so its size will be preserved during the upcoming call to DockNodeTreeUpdatePosSize().
16002 ImGuiDockNode* node_to_preserve = touching_node->ParentNode->ChildNodes[side_n];
16003 node_to_preserve->WantLockSizeOnce = true;
16004 //draw_list->AddRect(touching_node->Pos, touching_node->Rect().Max, IM_COL32(255, 0, 0, 255));
16005 //draw_list->AddRectFilled(node_to_preserve->Pos, node_to_preserve->Rect().Max, IM_COL32(0, 255, 0, 100));
16006 }
16007 touching_node = touching_node->ParentNode;
16008 }
16009 }
16010
16011 DockNodeTreeUpdatePosSize(child_0, child_0->Pos, child_0->Size);
16012 DockNodeTreeUpdatePosSize(child_1, child_1->Pos, child_1->Size);
16013 MarkIniSettingsDirty();
16014 }
16015 }
16016 PopID();
16017 }
16018 }
16019
16020 if (child_0->IsVisible)
16021 DockNodeTreeUpdateSplitter(child_0);
16022 if (child_1->IsVisible)
16023 DockNodeTreeUpdateSplitter(child_1);
16024}
16025
16026ImGuiDockNode* ImGui::DockNodeTreeFindFallbackLeafNode(ImGuiDockNode* node)
16027{
16028 if (node->IsLeafNode())
16029 return node;
16030 if (ImGuiDockNode* leaf_node = DockNodeTreeFindFallbackLeafNode(node->ChildNodes[0]))
16031 return leaf_node;
16032 if (ImGuiDockNode* leaf_node = DockNodeTreeFindFallbackLeafNode(node->ChildNodes[1]))
16033 return leaf_node;
16034 return NULL;
16035}
16036
16037ImGuiDockNode* ImGui::DockNodeTreeFindVisibleNodeByPos(ImGuiDockNode* node, ImVec2 pos)
16038{
16039 if (!node->IsVisible)
16040 return NULL;
16041
16042 const float dock_spacing = 0.0f;// g.Style.ItemInnerSpacing.x; // FIXME: Relation to DOCKING_SPLITTER_SIZE?
16043 ImRect r(node->Pos, node->Pos + node->Size);
16044 r.Expand(dock_spacing * 0.5f);
16045 bool inside = r.Contains(pos);
16046 if (!inside)
16047 return NULL;
16048
16049 if (node->IsLeafNode())
16050 return node;
16051 if (ImGuiDockNode* hovered_node = DockNodeTreeFindVisibleNodeByPos(node->ChildNodes[0], pos))
16052 return hovered_node;
16053 if (ImGuiDockNode* hovered_node = DockNodeTreeFindVisibleNodeByPos(node->ChildNodes[1], pos))
16054 return hovered_node;
16055
16056 return NULL;
16057}
16058
16059//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
16060// Docking: Public Functions (SetWindowDock, DockSpace, DockSpaceOverViewport)
16061//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
16062// - SetWindowDock() [Internal]
16063// - DockSpace()
16064// - DockSpaceOverViewport()
16065//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
16066
16067// [Internal] Called via SetNextWindowDockID()
16068void ImGui::SetWindowDock(ImGuiWindow* window, ImGuiID dock_id, ImGuiCond cond)
16069{
16070 // Test condition (NB: bit 0 is always true) and clear flags for next time
16071 if (cond && (window->SetWindowDockAllowFlags & cond) == 0)
16072 return;
16073 window->SetWindowDockAllowFlags &= ~(ImGuiCond_Once | ImGuiCond_FirstUseEver | ImGuiCond_Appearing);
16074
16075 if (window->DockId == dock_id)
16076 return;
16077
16078 // If the user attempt to set a dock id that is a split node, we'll dig within to find a suitable docking spot
16079 ImGuiContext* ctx = GImGui;
16080 if (ImGuiDockNode* new_node = DockContextFindNodeByID(ctx, dock_id))
16081 if (new_node->IsSplitNode())
16082 {
16083 // Policy: Find central node or latest focused node. We first move back to our root node.
16084 new_node = DockNodeGetRootNode(new_node);
16085 if (new_node->CentralNode)
16086 {
16087 IM_ASSERT(new_node->CentralNode->IsCentralNode());
16088 dock_id = new_node->CentralNode->ID;
16089 }
16090 else
16091 {
16092 dock_id = new_node->LastFocusedNodeId;
16093 }
16094 }
16095
16096 if (window->DockId == dock_id)
16097 return;
16098
16099 if (window->DockNode)
16100 DockNodeRemoveWindow(window->DockNode, window, 0);
16101 window->DockId = dock_id;
16102}
16103
16104// Create an explicit dockspace node within an existing window. Also expose dock node flags and creates a CentralNode by default.
16105// The Central Node is always displayed even when empty and shrink/extend according to the requested size of its neighbors.
16106// DockSpace() needs to be submitted _before_ any window they can host. If you use a dockspace, submit it early in your app.
16107ImGuiID ImGui::DockSpace(ImGuiID id, const ImVec2& size_arg, ImGuiDockNodeFlags flags, const ImGuiWindowClass* window_class)
16108{
16109 ImGuiContext* ctx = GImGui;
16110 ImGuiContext& g = *ctx;
16111 ImGuiWindow* window = GetCurrentWindow();
16112 if (!(g.IO.ConfigFlags & ImGuiConfigFlags_DockingEnable))
16113 return 0;
16114
16115 // Early out if parent window is hidden/collapsed
16116 // This is faster but also DockNodeUpdateTabBar() relies on TabBarLayout() running (which won't if SkipItems=true) to set NextSelectedTabId = 0). See #2960.
16117 // If for whichever reason this is causing problem we would need to ensure that DockNodeUpdateTabBar() ends up clearing NextSelectedTabId even if SkipItems=true.
16118 if (window->SkipItems)
16119 flags |= ImGuiDockNodeFlags_KeepAliveOnly;
16120
16121 IM_ASSERT((flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_DockSpace) == 0);
16122 IM_ASSERT(id != 0);
