17823 Text("HoveredDockNode: 0x%08X", g.HoveredDockNode ? g.HoveredDockNode->ID : 0);
17824 Text("MovingWindow: '%s'", g.MovingWindow ? g.MovingWindow->Name : "NULL");
17825 Text("MouseViewport: 0x%08X (UserHovered 0x%08X, LastHovered 0x%08X)", g.MouseViewport->ID, g.IO.MouseHoveredViewport, g.MouseLastHoveredViewport ? g.MouseLastHoveredViewport->ID : 0);
17826 Unindent();
17827
17828 Text("ITEMS");
17829 Indent();
17830 Text("ActiveId: 0x%08X/0x%08X (%.2f sec), AllowOverlap: %d, Source: %s", g.ActiveId, g.ActiveIdPreviousFrame, g.ActiveIdTimer, g.ActiveIdAllowOverlap, GetInputSourceName(g.ActiveIdSource));
17831 Text("ActiveIdWindow: '%s'", g.ActiveIdWindow ? g.ActiveIdWindow->Name : "NULL");
17832
17833 int active_id_using_key_input_count = 0;
17834 for (int n = 0; n < g.ActiveIdUsingKeyInputMask.Size; n++)
17835 active_id_using_key_input_count += g.ActiveIdUsingKeyInputMask.TestBit(n) ? 1 : 0;
17836 Text("ActiveIdUsing: Wheel: %d, NavDirMask: %X, NavInputMask: %X, KeyInputMask: %d key(s)", g.ActiveIdUsingMouseWheel, g.ActiveIdUsingNavDirMask, g.ActiveIdUsingNavInputMask, active_id_using_key_input_count);
17837 Text("HoveredId: 0x%08X (%.2f sec), AllowOverlap: %d", g.HoveredIdPreviousFrame, g.HoveredIdTimer, g.HoveredIdAllowOverlap); // Not displaying g.HoveredId as it is update mid-frame
17838 Text("DragDrop: %d, SourceId = 0x%08X, Payload \"%s\" (%d bytes)", g.DragDropActive, g.DragDropPayload.SourceId, g.DragDropPayload.DataType, g.DragDropPayload.DataSize);
17839 Unindent();
17840
17841 Text("NAV,FOCUS");
17842 Indent();
17843 Text("NavWindow: '%s'", g.NavWindow ? g.NavWindow->Name : "NULL");
17844 Text("NavId: 0x%08X, NavLayer: %d", g.NavId, g.NavLayer);
17845 Text("NavInputSource: %s", GetInputSourceName(g.NavInputSource));
17846 Text("NavActive: %d, NavVisible: %d", g.IO.NavActive, g.IO.NavVisible);
17847 Text("NavActivateId/DownId/PressedId/InputId: %08X/%08X/%08X/%08X", g.NavActivateId, g.NavActivateDownId, g.NavActivatePressedId, g.NavActivateInputId);
17848 Text("NavActivateFlags: %04X", g.NavActivateFlags);
17849 Text("NavDisableHighlight: %d, NavDisableMouseHover: %d", g.NavDisableHighlight, g.NavDisableMouseHover);
17850 Text("NavFocusScopeId = 0x%08X", g.NavFocusScopeId);
17851 Text("NavWindowingTarget: '%s'", g.NavWindowingTarget ? g.NavWindowingTarget->Name : "NULL");
17852 Unindent();
17853
17854 TreePop();
17855 }
17856
17857 // Overlay: Display windows Rectangles and Begin Order
17858 if (cfg->ShowWindowsRects || cfg->ShowWindowsBeginOrder)
17859 {
17860 for (int n = 0; n < g.Windows.Size; n++)
17861 {
17862 ImGuiWindow* window = g.Windows[n];
17863 if (!window->WasActive)
17864 continue;
17865 ImDrawList* draw_list = GetForegroundDrawList(window);
17866 if (cfg->ShowWindowsRects)
17867 {
17868 ImRect r = Funcs::GetWindowRect(window, cfg->ShowWindowsRectsType);
17869 draw_list->AddRect(r.Min, r.Max, IM_COL32(255, 0, 128, 255));
17870 }
17871 if (cfg->ShowWindowsBeginOrder && !(window->Flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_ChildWindow))
17872 {
17873 char buf[32];
17874 ImFormatString(buf, IM_ARRAYSIZE(buf), "%d", window->BeginOrderWithinContext);
17875 float font_size = GetFontSize();
17876 draw_list->AddRectFilled(window->Pos, window->Pos + ImVec2(font_size, font_size), IM_COL32(200, 100, 100, 255));
17877 draw_list->AddText(window->Pos, IM_COL32(255, 255, 255, 255), buf);
17878 }
17879 }
17880 }
17881
17882 // Overlay: Display Tables Rectangles
17883 if (cfg->ShowTablesRects)
17884 {
17885 for (int table_n = 0; table_n < g.Tables.GetMapSize(); table_n++)
17886 {
17887 ImGuiTable* table = g.Tables.TryGetMapData(table_n);
17888 if (table == NULL || table->LastFrameActive < g.FrameCount - 1)
17889 continue;
17890 ImDrawList* draw_list = GetForegroundDrawList(table->OuterWindow);
17891 if (cfg->ShowTablesRectsType >= TRT_ColumnsRect)
17892 {
17893 for (int column_n = 0; column_n < table->ColumnsCount; column_n++)
17894 {
17895 ImRect r = Funcs::GetTableRect(table, cfg->ShowTablesRectsType, column_n);
17896 ImU32 col = (table->HoveredColumnBody == column_n) ? IM_COL32(255, 255, 128, 255) : IM_COL32(255, 0, 128, 255);
17897 float thickness = (table->HoveredColumnBody == column_n) ? 3.0f : 1.0f;
17898 draw_list->AddRect(r.Min, r.Max, col, 0.0f, 0, thickness);
17899 }
17900 }
17901 else
17902 {
17903 ImRect r = Funcs::GetTableRect(table, cfg->ShowTablesRectsType, -1);
17904 draw_list->AddRect(r.Min, r.Max, IM_COL32(255, 0, 128, 255));
17905 }
17906 }
17907 }
17908
17909#ifdef IMGUI_HAS_DOCK
17910 // Overlay: Display Docking info
17911 if (cfg->ShowDockingNodes && g.IO.KeyCtrl && g.HoveredDockNode)
17912 {
17913 char buf[64] = "";
17914 char* p = buf;
17915 ImGuiDockNode* node = g.HoveredDockNode;
17916 ImDrawList* overlay_draw_list = node->HostWindow ? GetForegroundDrawList(node->HostWindow) : GetForegroundDrawList(GetMainViewport());
17917 p += ImFormatString(p, buf + IM_ARRAYSIZE(buf) - p, "DockId: %X%s\n", node->ID, node->IsCentralNode() ? " *CentralNode*" : "");
17918 p += ImFormatString(p, buf + IM_ARRAYSIZE(buf) - p, "WindowClass: %08X\n", node->WindowClass.ClassId);
17919 p += ImFormatString(p, buf + IM_ARRAYSIZE(buf) - p, "Size: (%.0f, %.0f)\n", node->Size.x, node->Size.y);
17920 p += ImFormatString(p, buf + IM_ARRAYSIZE(buf) - p, "SizeRef: (%.0f, %.0f)\n", node->SizeRef.x, node->SizeRef.y);
17921 int depth = DockNodeGetDepth(node);
17922 overlay_draw_list->AddRect(node->Pos + ImVec2(3, 3) * (float)depth, node->Pos + node->Size - ImVec2(3, 3) * (float)depth, IM_COL32(200, 100, 100, 255));
17923 ImVec2 pos = node->Pos + ImVec2(3, 3) * (float)depth;
17924 overlay_draw_list->AddRectFilled(pos - ImVec2(1, 1), pos + CalcTextSize(buf) + ImVec2(1, 1), IM_COL32(200, 100, 100, 255));
17925 overlay_draw_list->AddText(NULL, 0.0f, pos, IM_COL32(255, 255, 255, 255), buf);
17926 }
17927#endif // #ifdef IMGUI_HAS_DOCK
17928
17929 End();
17930}
17931
17932// [DEBUG] List fonts in a font atlas and display its texture
17933void ImGui::ShowFontAtlas(ImFontAtlas* atlas)
17934{
17935 for (int i = 0; i < atlas->Fonts.Size; i++)
17936 {
17937 ImFont* font = atlas->Fonts[i];
17938 PushID(font);
17939 DebugNodeFont(font);
17940 PopID();
17941 }
17942 if (TreeNode("Atlas texture", "Atlas texture (%dx%d pixels)", atlas->TexWidth, atlas->TexHeight))
17943 {
17944 ImVec4 tint_col = ImVec4(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f);
17945 ImVec4 border_col = ImVec4(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f, 0.5f);
17946 Image(atlas->TexID, ImVec2((float)atlas->TexWidth, (float)atlas->TexHeight), ImVec2(0.0f, 0.0f), ImVec2(1.0f, 1.0f), tint_col, border_col);
17947 TreePop();
17948 }
17949}
17950
17951// [DEBUG] Display contents of Columns
17952void ImGui::DebugNodeColumns(ImGuiOldColumns* columns)
17953{
17954 if (!TreeNode((void*)(uintptr_t)columns->ID, "Columns Id: 0x%08X, Count: %d, Flags: 0x%04X", columns->ID, columns->Count, columns->Flags))
17955 return;
17956 BulletText("Width: %.1f (MinX: %.1f, MaxX: %.1f)", columns->OffMaxX - columns->OffMinX, columns->OffMinX, columns->OffMaxX);
17957 for (int column_n = 0; column_n < columns->Columns.Size; column_n++)
17958 BulletText("Column %02d: OffsetNorm %.3f (= %.1f px)", column_n, columns->Columns[column_n].OffsetNorm, GetColumnOffsetFromNorm(columns, columns->Columns[column_n].OffsetNorm));
17959 TreePop();
17960}
17961
17962static void DebugNodeDockNodeFlags(ImGuiDockNodeFlags* p_flags, const char* label, bool enabled)
17963{
17964 using namespace ImGui;
17965 PushID(label);
17966 PushStyleVar(ImGuiStyleVar_FramePadding, ImVec2(0.0f, 0.0f));
17967 Text("%s:", label);
17968 if (!enabled)
17969 BeginDisabled();
17970 CheckboxFlags("NoSplit", p_flags, ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoSplit);
17971 CheckboxFlags("NoResize", p_flags, ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoResize);
17972 CheckboxFlags("NoResizeX", p_flags, ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoResizeX);
17973 CheckboxFlags("NoResizeY",p_flags, ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoResizeY);
17974 CheckboxFlags("NoTabBar", p_flags, ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoTabBar);
17975 CheckboxFlags("HiddenTabBar", p_flags, ImGuiDockNodeFlags_HiddenTabBar);
17976 CheckboxFlags("NoWindowMenuButton", p_flags, ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoWindowMenuButton);
17977 CheckboxFlags("NoCloseButton", p_flags, ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoCloseButton);
17978 CheckboxFlags("NoDocking", p_flags, ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoDocking);
17979 CheckboxFlags("NoDockingSplitMe", p_flags, ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoDockingSplitMe);
17980 CheckboxFlags("NoDockingSplitOther", p_flags, ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoDockingSplitOther);
17981 CheckboxFlags("NoDockingOverMe", p_flags, ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoDockingOverMe);
17982 CheckboxFlags("NoDockingOverOther", p_flags, ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoDockingOverOther);
17983 CheckboxFlags("NoDockingOverEmpty", p_flags, ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoDockingOverEmpty);
17984 if (!enabled)
17985 EndDisabled();
17986 PopStyleVar();
17987 PopID();
17988}
17989
17990// [DEBUG] Display contents of ImDockNode
17991void ImGui::DebugNodeDockNode(ImGuiDockNode* node, const char* label)
17992{
17993 ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
17994 const bool is_alive = (g.FrameCount - node->LastFrameAlive < 2); // Submitted with ImGuiDockNodeFlags_KeepAliveOnly
17995 const bool is_active = (g.FrameCount - node->LastFrameActive < 2); // Submitted
17996 if (!is_alive) { PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_Text, GetStyleColorVec4(ImGuiCol_TextDisabled)); }
17997 bool open;
17998 if (node->Windows.Size > 0)
17999 open = TreeNode((void*)(intptr_t)node->ID, "%s 0x%04X%s: %d windows (vis: '%s')", label, node->ID, node->IsVisible ? "" : " (hidden)", node->Windows.Size, node->VisibleWindow ? node->VisibleWindow->Name : "NULL");
18000 else
18001 open = TreeNode((void*)(intptr_t)node->ID, "%s 0x%04X%s: %s split (vis: '%s')", label, node->ID, node->IsVisible ? "" : " (hidden)", (node->SplitAxis == ImGuiAxis_X) ? "horizontal" : (node->SplitAxis == ImGuiAxis_Y) ? "vertical" : "n/a", node->VisibleWindow ? node->VisibleWindow->Name : "NULL");
18002 if (!is_alive) { PopStyleColor(); }
18003 if (is_active && IsItemHovered())
18004 if (ImGuiWindow* window = node->HostWindow ? node->HostWindow : node->VisibleWindow)
18005 GetForegroundDrawList(window)->AddRect(node->Pos, node->Pos + node->Size, IM_COL32(255, 255, 0, 255));
18006 if (open)
18007 {
18008 IM_ASSERT(node->ChildNodes[0] == NULL || node->ChildNodes[0]->ParentNode == node);
18009 IM_ASSERT(node->ChildNodes[1] == NULL || node->ChildNodes[1]->ParentNode == node);
18010 BulletText("Pos (%.0f,%.0f), Size (%.0f, %.0f) Ref (%.0f, %.0f)",
18011 node->Pos.x, node->Pos.y, node->Size.x, node->Size.y, node->SizeRef.x, node->SizeRef.y);
18012 DebugNodeWindow(node->HostWindow, "HostWindow");
18013 DebugNodeWindow(node->VisibleWindow, "VisibleWindow");
18014 BulletText("SelectedTabID: 0x%08X, LastFocusedNodeID: 0x%08X", node->SelectedTabId, node->LastFocusedNodeId);
18015 BulletText("Misc:%s%s%s%s%s%s",
18016 node->IsDockSpace() ? " IsDockSpace" : "",
18017 node->IsCentralNode() ? " IsCentralNode" : "",
18018 is_alive ? " IsAlive" : "", is_active ? " IsActive" : "",
18019 node->WantLockSizeOnce ? " WantLockSizeOnce" : "",
18020 node->HasCentralNodeChild ? " HasCentralNodeChild" : "");
18021 if (TreeNode("flags", "Flags Merged: 0x%04X, Local: 0x%04X, InWindows: 0x%04X, Shared: 0x%04X", node->MergedFlags, node->LocalFlags, node->LocalFlagsInWindows, node->SharedFlags))
18022 {
18023 if (BeginTable("flags", 4))
18024 {
18025 TableNextColumn(); DebugNodeDockNodeFlags(&node->MergedFlags, "MergedFlags", false);
18026 TableNextColumn(); DebugNodeDockNodeFlags(&node->LocalFlags, "LocalFlags", true);
18027 TableNextColumn(); DebugNodeDockNodeFlags(&node->LocalFlagsInWindows, "LocalFlagsInWindows", false);
18028 TableNextColumn(); DebugNodeDockNodeFlags(&node->SharedFlags, "SharedFlags", true);
18029 EndTable();
18030 }
18031 TreePop();
18032 }
18033 if (node->ParentNode)
18034 DebugNodeDockNode(node->ParentNode, "ParentNode");
18035 if (node->ChildNodes[0])
18036 DebugNodeDockNode(node->ChildNodes[0], "Child[0]");
18037 if (node->ChildNodes[1])
18038 DebugNodeDockNode(node->ChildNodes[1], "Child[1]");
18039 if (node->TabBar)
18040 DebugNodeTabBar(node->TabBar, "TabBar");
18041 TreePop();
18042 }
18043}
18044
18045// [DEBUG] Display contents of ImDrawList
18046// Note that both 'window' and 'viewport' may be NULL here. Viewport is generally null of destroyed popups which previously owned a viewport.
18047void ImGui::DebugNodeDrawList(ImGuiWindow* window, ImGuiViewportP* viewport, const ImDrawList* draw_list, const char* label)
18048{
18049 ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
18050 ImGuiMetricsConfig* cfg = &g.DebugMetricsConfig;
18051 int cmd_count = draw_list->CmdBuffer.Size;
18052 if (cmd_count > 0 && draw_list->CmdBuffer.back().ElemCount == 0 && draw_list->CmdBuffer.back().UserCallback == NULL)
18053 cmd_count--;
18054 bool node_open = TreeNode(draw_list, "%s: '%s' %d vtx, %d indices, %d cmds", label, draw_list->_OwnerName ? draw_list->_OwnerName : "", draw_list->VtxBuffer.Size, draw_list->IdxBuffer.Size, cmd_count);
18055 if (draw_list == GetWindowDrawList())
18056 {
18057 SameLine();
18058 TextColored(ImVec4(1.0f, 0.4f, 0.4f, 1.0f), "CURRENTLY APPENDING"); // Can't display stats for active draw list! (we don't have the data double-buffered)
18059 if (node_open)
18060 TreePop();
18061 return;
18062 }
18063
18064 ImDrawList* fg_draw_list = viewport ? GetForegroundDrawList(viewport) : NULL; // Render additional visuals into the top-most draw list
18065 if (window && IsItemHovered() && fg_draw_list)
18066 fg_draw_list->AddRect(window->Pos, window->Pos + window->Size, IM_COL32(255, 255, 0, 255));
18067 if (!node_open)
18068 return;
18069
18070 if (window && !window->WasActive)
18071 TextDisabled("Warning: owning Window is inactive. This DrawList is not being rendered!");
18072
18073 for (const ImDrawCmd* pcmd = draw_list->CmdBuffer.Data; pcmd < draw_list->CmdBuffer.Data + cmd_count; pcmd++)
18074 {
18075 if (pcmd->UserCallback)
18076 {
18077 BulletText("Callback %p, user_data %p", pcmd->UserCallback, pcmd->UserCallbackData);
18078 continue;
18079 }
18080
18081 char buf[300];
18082 ImFormatString(buf, IM_ARRAYSIZE(buf), "DrawCmd:%5d tris, Tex 0x%p, ClipRect (%4.0f,%4.0f)-(%4.0f,%4.0f)",
18083 pcmd->ElemCount / 3, (void*)(intptr_t)pcmd->TextureId,
18084 pcmd->ClipRect.x, pcmd->ClipRect.y, pcmd->ClipRect.z, pcmd->ClipRect.w);
18085 bool pcmd_node_open = TreeNode((void*)(pcmd - draw_list->CmdBuffer.begin()), "%s", buf);
18086 if (IsItemHovered() && (cfg->ShowDrawCmdMesh || cfg->ShowDrawCmdBoundingBoxes) && fg_draw_list)
18087 DebugNodeDrawCmdShowMeshAndBoundingBox(fg_draw_list, draw_list, pcmd, cfg->ShowDrawCmdMesh, cfg->ShowDrawCmdBoundingBoxes);
18088 if (!pcmd_node_open)
18089 continue;
18090
18091 // Calculate approximate coverage area (touched pixel count)
18092 // This will be in pixels squared as long there's no post-scaling happening to the renderer output.
18093 const ImDrawIdx* idx_buffer = (draw_list->IdxBuffer.Size > 0) ? draw_list->IdxBuffer.Data : NULL;
18094 const ImDrawVert* vtx_buffer = draw_list->VtxBuffer.Data + pcmd->VtxOffset;
18095 float total_area = 0.0f;
18096 for (unsigned int idx_n = pcmd->IdxOffset; idx_n < pcmd->IdxOffset + pcmd->ElemCount; )
18097 {
18098 ImVec2 triangle[3];
18099 for (int n = 0; n < 3; n++, idx_n++)
18100 triangle[n] = vtx_buffer[idx_buffer ? idx_buffer[idx_n] : idx_n].pos;
18101 total_area += ImTriangleArea(triangle[0], triangle[1], triangle[2]);
18102 }
18103
18104 // Display vertex information summary. Hover to get all triangles drawn in wire-frame
18105 ImFormatString(buf, IM_ARRAYSIZE(buf), "Mesh: ElemCount: %d, VtxOffset: +%d, IdxOffset: +%d, Area: ~%0.f px", pcmd->ElemCount, pcmd->VtxOffset, pcmd->IdxOffset, total_area);
18106 Selectable(buf);
18107 if (IsItemHovered() && fg_draw_list)
18108 DebugNodeDrawCmdShowMeshAndBoundingBox(fg_draw_list, draw_list, pcmd, true, false);
18109
18110 // Display individual triangles/vertices. Hover on to get the corresponding triangle highlighted.
18111 ImGuiListClipper clipper;
18112 clipper.Begin(pcmd->ElemCount / 3); // Manually coarse clip our print out of individual vertices to save CPU, only items that may be visible.
18113 while (clipper.Step())
18114 for (int prim = clipper.DisplayStart, idx_i = pcmd->IdxOffset + clipper.DisplayStart * 3; prim < clipper.DisplayEnd; prim++)
18115 {
18116 char* buf_p = buf, * buf_end = buf + IM_ARRAYSIZE(buf);
18117 ImVec2 triangle[3];
18118 for (int n = 0; n < 3; n++, idx_i++)
18119 {
18120 const ImDrawVert& v = vtx_buffer[idx_buffer ? idx_buffer[idx_i] : idx_i];
18121 triangle[n] = v.pos;
18122 buf_p += ImFormatString(buf_p, buf_end - buf_p, "%s %04d: pos (%8.2f,%8.2f), uv (%.6f,%.6f), col %08X\n",
18123 (n == 0) ? "Vert:" : " ", idx_i, v.pos.x, v.pos.y, v.uv.x, v.uv.y, v.col);
18124 }
18125
18126 Selectable(buf, false);
18127 if (fg_draw_list && IsItemHovered())
18128 {
18129 ImDrawListFlags backup_flags = fg_draw_list->Flags;
18130 fg_draw_list->Flags &= ~ImDrawListFlags_AntiAliasedLines; // Disable AA on triangle outlines is more readable for very large and thin triangles.
18131 fg_draw_list->AddPolyline(triangle, 3, IM_COL32(255, 255, 0, 255), ImDrawFlags_Closed, 1.0f);
18132 fg_draw_list->Flags = backup_flags;
18133 }
18134 }
18135 TreePop();
18136 }
18137 TreePop();
18138}
18139
18140// [DEBUG] Display mesh/aabb of a ImDrawCmd
18141void ImGui::DebugNodeDrawCmdShowMeshAndBoundingBox(ImDrawList* out_draw_list, const ImDrawList* draw_list, const ImDrawCmd* draw_cmd, bool show_mesh, bool show_aabb)
18142{
18143 IM_ASSERT(show_mesh || show_aabb);
18144
18145 // Draw wire-frame version of all triangles
18146 ImRect clip_rect = draw_cmd->ClipRect;
18147 ImRect vtxs_rect(FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, -FLT_MAX, -FLT_MAX);
18148 ImDrawListFlags backup_flags = out_draw_list->Flags;
18149 out_draw_list->Flags &= ~ImDrawListFlags_AntiAliasedLines; // Disable AA on triangle outlines is more readable for very large and thin triangles.
18150 for (unsigned int idx_n = draw_cmd->IdxOffset, idx_end = draw_cmd->IdxOffset + draw_cmd->ElemCount; idx_n < idx_end; )
18151 {
18152 ImDrawIdx* idx_buffer = (draw_list->IdxBuffer.Size > 0) ? draw_list->IdxBuffer.Data : NULL; // We don't hold on those pointers past iterations as ->AddPolyline() may invalidate them if out_draw_list==draw_list
18153 ImDrawVert* vtx_buffer = draw_list->VtxBuffer.Data + draw_cmd->VtxOffset;
18154
18155 ImVec2 triangle[3];
18156 for (int n = 0; n < 3; n++, idx_n++)
18157 vtxs_rect.Add((triangle[n] = vtx_buffer[idx_buffer ? idx_buffer[idx_n] : idx_n].pos));
18158 if (show_mesh)
18159 out_draw_list->AddPolyline(triangle, 3, IM_COL32(255, 255, 0, 255), ImDrawFlags_Closed, 1.0f); // In yellow: mesh triangles
18160 }
18161 // Draw bounding boxes
18162 if (show_aabb)
18163 {
18164 out_draw_list->AddRect(ImFloor(clip_rect.Min), ImFloor(clip_rect.Max), IM_COL32(255, 0, 255, 255)); // In pink: clipping rectangle submitted to GPU
18165 out_draw_list->AddRect(ImFloor(vtxs_rect.Min), ImFloor(vtxs_rect.Max), IM_COL32(0, 255, 255, 255)); // In cyan: bounding box of triangles
18166 }
18167 out_draw_list->Flags = backup_flags;
18168}
18169
18170// [DEBUG] Display details for a single font, called by ShowStyleEditor().
18171void ImGui::DebugNodeFont(ImFont* font)
18172{
18173 bool opened = TreeNode(font, "Font: \"%s\"\n%.2f px, %d glyphs, %d file(s)",
18174 font->ConfigData ? font->ConfigData[0].Name : "", font->FontSize, font->Glyphs.Size, font->ConfigDataCount);
18175 SameLine();
18176 if (SmallButton("Set as default"))
18177 GetIO().FontDefault = font;
18178 if (!opened)
18179 return;
18180
18181 // Display preview text
18182 PushFont(font);
18183 Text("The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog");
18184 PopFont();
18185
18186 // Display details
18187 SetNextItemWidth(GetFontSize() * 8);
18188 DragFloat("Font scale", &font->Scale, 0.005f, 0.3f, 2.0f, "%.1f");
18189 SameLine(); MetricsHelpMarker(
18190 "Note than the default embedded font is NOT meant to be scaled.\n\n"
18191 "Font are currently rendered into bitmaps at a given size at the time of building the atlas. "
18192 "You may oversample them to get some flexibility with scaling. "
18193 "You can also render at multiple sizes and select which one to use at runtime.\n\n"
18194 "(Glimmer of hope: the atlas system will be rewritten in the future to make scaling more flexible.)");
18195 Text("Ascent: %f, Descent: %f, Height: %f", font->Ascent, font->Descent, font->Ascent - font->Descent);
18196 char c_str[5];
18197 Text("Fallback character: '%s' (U+%04X)", ImTextCharToUtf8(c_str, font->FallbackChar), font->FallbackChar);
18198 Text("Ellipsis character: '%s' (U+%04X)", ImTextCharToUtf8(c_str, font->EllipsisChar), font->EllipsisChar);
18199 const int surface_sqrt = (int)ImSqrt((float)font->MetricsTotalSurface);
18200 Text("Texture Area: about %d px ~%dx%d px", font->MetricsTotalSurface, surface_sqrt, surface_sqrt);
18201 for (int config_i = 0; config_i < font->ConfigDataCount; config_i++)
18202 if (font->ConfigData)
18203 if (const ImFontConfig* cfg = &font->ConfigData[config_i])
18204 BulletText("Input %d: \'%s\', Oversample: (%d,%d), PixelSnapH: %d, Offset: (%.1f,%.1f)",
18205 config_i, cfg->Name, cfg->OversampleH, cfg->OversampleV, cfg->PixelSnapH, cfg->GlyphOffset.x, cfg->GlyphOffset.y);
18206
18207 // Display all glyphs of the fonts in separate pages of 256 characters
18208 if (TreeNode("Glyphs", "Glyphs (%d)", font->Glyphs.Size))
18209 {
18210 ImDrawList* draw_list = GetWindowDrawList();
18211 const ImU32 glyph_col = GetColorU32(ImGuiCol_Text);
18212 const float cell_size = font->FontSize * 1;
18213 const float cell_spacing = GetStyle().ItemSpacing.y;
18214 for (unsigned int base = 0; base <= IM_UNICODE_CODEPOINT_MAX; base += 256)
18215 {
18216 // Skip ahead if a large bunch of glyphs are not present in the font (test in chunks of 4k)
18217 // This is only a small optimization to reduce the number of iterations when IM_UNICODE_MAX_CODEPOINT
18218 // is large // (if ImWchar==ImWchar32 we will do at least about 272 queries here)
18219 if (!(base & 4095) && font->IsGlyphRangeUnused(base, base + 4095))
18220 {
18221 base += 4096 - 256;
18222 continue;
18223 }
18224
18225 int count = 0;
18226 for (unsigned int n = 0; n < 256; n++)
18227 if (font->FindGlyphNoFallback((ImWchar)(base + n)))
18228 count++;
18229 if (count <= 0)
18230 continue;
18231 if (!TreeNode((void*)(intptr_t)base, "U+%04X..U+%04X (%d %s)", base, base + 255, count, count > 1 ? "glyphs" : "glyph"))
18232 continue;
18233
18234 // Draw a 16x16 grid of glyphs
18235 ImVec2 base_pos = GetCursorScreenPos();
18236 for (unsigned int n = 0; n < 256; n++)
18237 {
18238 // We use ImFont::RenderChar as a shortcut because we don't have UTF-8 conversion functions
18239 // available here and thus cannot easily generate a zero-terminated UTF-8 encoded string.
18240 ImVec2 cell_p1(base_pos.x + (n % 16) * (cell_size + cell_spacing), base_pos.y + (n / 16) * (cell_size + cell_spacing));
18241 ImVec2 cell_p2(cell_p1.x + cell_size, cell_p1.y + cell_size);
18242 const ImFontGlyph* glyph = font->FindGlyphNoFallback((ImWchar)(base + n));
18243 draw_list->AddRect(cell_p1, cell_p2, glyph ? IM_COL32(255, 255, 255, 100) : IM_COL32(255, 255, 255, 50));
18244 if (glyph)
18245 font->RenderChar(draw_list, cell_size, cell_p1, glyph_col, (ImWchar)(base + n));
18246 if (glyph && IsMouseHoveringRect(cell_p1, cell_p2))
18247 {
18248 BeginTooltip();
18249 Text("Codepoint: U+%04X", base + n);
18250 Separator();
18251 Text("Visible: %d", glyph->Visible);
18252 Text("AdvanceX: %.1f", glyph->AdvanceX);
18253 Text("Pos: (%.2f,%.2f)->(%.2f,%.2f)", glyph->X0, glyph->Y0, glyph->X1, glyph->Y1);
18254 Text("UV: (%.3f,%.3f)->(%.3f,%.3f)", glyph->U0, glyph->V0, glyph->U1, glyph->V1);
18255 EndTooltip();
18256 }
18257 }
18258 Dummy(ImVec2((cell_size + cell_spacing) * 16, (cell_size + cell_spacing) * 16));
18259 TreePop();
18260 }
18261 TreePop();
18262 }
18263 TreePop();
18264}
18265
18266// [DEBUG] Display contents of ImGuiStorage
18267void ImGui::DebugNodeStorage(ImGuiStorage* storage, const char* label)
18268{
18269 if (!TreeNode(label, "%s: %d entries, %d bytes", label, storage->Data.Size, storage->Data.size_in_bytes()))
18270 return;
18271 for (int n = 0; n < storage->Data.Size; n++)
18272 {
18273 const ImGuiStorage::ImGuiStoragePair& p = storage->Data[n];
18274 BulletText("Key 0x%08X Value { i: %d }", p.key, p.val_i); // Important: we currently don't store a type, real value may not be integer.
18275 }
18276 TreePop();
18277}
18278
18279// [DEBUG] Display contents of ImGuiTabBar
18280void ImGui::DebugNodeTabBar(ImGuiTabBar* tab_bar, const char* label)
18281{
18282 // Standalone tab bars (not associated to docking/windows functionality) currently hold no discernible strings.
18283 char buf[256];
18284 char* p = buf;
18285 const char* buf_end = buf + IM_ARRAYSIZE(buf);
18286 const bool is_active = (tab_bar->PrevFrameVisible >= GetFrameCount() - 2);
18287 p += ImFormatString(p, buf_end - p, "%s 0x%08X (%d tabs)%s", label, tab_bar->ID, tab_bar->Tabs.Size, is_active ? "" : " *Inactive*");
18288 p += ImFormatString(p, buf_end - p, " { ");
18289 for (int tab_n = 0; tab_n < ImMin(tab_bar->Tabs.Size, 3); tab_n++)
18290 {
18291 ImGuiTabItem* tab = &tab_bar->Tabs[tab_n];
18292 p += ImFormatString(p, buf_end - p, "%s'%s'",
18293 tab_n > 0 ? ", " : "", (tab->Window || tab->NameOffset != -1) ? tab_bar->GetTabName(tab) : "???");
18294 }
18295 p += ImFormatString(p, buf_end - p, (tab_bar->Tabs.Size > 3) ? " ... }" : " } ");
18296 if (!is_active) { PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_Text, GetStyleColorVec4(ImGuiCol_TextDisabled)); }
18297 bool open = TreeNode(label, "%s", buf);
18298 if (!is_active) { PopStyleColor(); }
18299 if (is_active && IsItemHovered())
18300 {
18301 ImDrawList* draw_list = GetForegroundDrawList();
18302 draw_list->AddRect(tab_bar->BarRect.Min, tab_bar->BarRect.Max, IM_COL32(255, 255, 0, 255));
18303 draw_list->AddLine(ImVec2(tab_bar->ScrollingRectMinX, tab_bar->BarRect.Min.y), ImVec2(tab_bar->ScrollingRectMinX, tab_bar->BarRect.Max.y), IM_COL32(0, 255, 0, 255));
18304 draw_list->AddLine(ImVec2(tab_bar->ScrollingRectMaxX, tab_bar->BarRect.Min.y), ImVec2(tab_bar->ScrollingRectMaxX, tab_bar->BarRect.Max.y), IM_COL32(0, 255, 0, 255));
18305 }
18306 if (open)
18307 {
18308 for (int tab_n = 0; tab_n < tab_bar->Tabs.Size; tab_n++)
18309 {
18310 const ImGuiTabItem* tab = &tab_bar->Tabs[tab_n];
18311 PushID(tab);
18312 if (SmallButton("<")) { TabBarQueueReorder(tab_bar, tab, -1); } SameLine(0, 2);
18313 if (SmallButton(">")) { TabBarQueueReorder(tab_bar, tab, +1); } SameLine();
18314 Text("%02d%c Tab 0x%08X '%s' Offset: %.1f, Width: %.1f/%.1f",
18315 tab_n, (tab->ID == tab_bar->SelectedTabId) ? '*' : ' ', tab->ID, (tab->Window || tab->NameOffset != -1) ? tab_bar->GetTabName(tab) : "???", tab->Offset, tab->Width, tab->ContentWidth);
18316 PopID();
18317 }
18318 TreePop();
18319 }
18320}
18321
18322void ImGui::DebugNodeViewport(ImGuiViewportP* viewport)
18323{
18324 SetNextItemOpen(true, ImGuiCond_Once);
18325 if (TreeNode((void*)(intptr_t)viewport->ID, "Viewport #%d, ID: 0x%08X, Parent: 0x%08X, Window: \"%s\"", viewport->Idx, viewport->ID, viewport->ParentViewportId, viewport->Window ? viewport->Window->Name : "N/A"))
18326 {
18327 ImGuiWindowFlags flags = viewport->Flags;
18328 BulletText("Main Pos: (%.0f,%.0f), Size: (%.0f,%.0f)\nWorkArea Offset Left: %.0f Top: %.0f, Right: %.0f, Bottom: %.0f\nMonitor: %d, DpiScale: %.0f%%",
18329 viewport->Pos.x, viewport->Pos.y, viewport->Size.x, viewport->Size.y,
18330 viewport->WorkOffsetMin.x, viewport->WorkOffsetMin.y, viewport->WorkOffsetMax.x, viewport->WorkOffsetMax.y,
18331 viewport->PlatformMonitor, viewport->DpiScale * 100.0f);
18332 if (viewport->Idx > 0) { SameLine(); if (SmallButton("Reset Pos")) { viewport->Pos = ImVec2(200, 200); viewport->UpdateWorkRect(); if (viewport->Window) viewport->Window->Pos = viewport->Pos; } }
18333 BulletText("Flags: 0x%04X =%s%s%s%s%s%s%s%s%s%s%s%s", viewport->Flags,
18334 //(flags & ImGuiViewportFlags_IsPlatformWindow) ? " IsPlatformWindow" : "", // Omitting because it is the standard
18335 (flags & ImGuiViewportFlags_IsPlatformMonitor) ? " IsPlatformMonitor" : "",
18336 (flags & ImGuiViewportFlags_OwnedByApp) ? " OwnedByApp" : "",
18337 (flags & ImGuiViewportFlags_NoDecoration) ? " NoDecoration" : "",
18338 (flags & ImGuiViewportFlags_NoTaskBarIcon) ? " NoTaskBarIcon" : "",
18339 (flags & ImGuiViewportFlags_NoFocusOnAppearing) ? " NoFocusOnAppearing" : "",
18340 (flags & ImGuiViewportFlags_NoFocusOnClick) ? " NoFocusOnClick" : "",
18341 (flags & ImGuiViewportFlags_NoInputs) ? " NoInputs" : "",
18342 (flags & ImGuiViewportFlags_NoRendererClear) ? " NoRendererClear" : "",
18343 (flags & ImGuiViewportFlags_TopMost) ? " TopMost" : "",
18344 (flags & ImGuiViewportFlags_Minimized) ? " Minimized" : "",
18345 (flags & ImGuiViewportFlags_NoAutoMerge) ? " NoAutoMerge" : "",
18346 (flags & ImGuiViewportFlags_CanHostOtherWindows) ? " CanHostOtherWindows" : "");
18347 for (int layer_i = 0; layer_i < IM_ARRAYSIZE(viewport->DrawDataBuilder.Layers); layer_i++)
18348 for (int draw_list_i = 0; draw_list_i < viewport->DrawDataBuilder.Layers[layer_i].Size; draw_list_i++)
18349 DebugNodeDrawList(NULL, viewport, viewport->DrawDataBuilder.Layers[layer_i][draw_list_i], "DrawList");
18350 TreePop();
18351 }
18352}
18353
18354void ImGui::DebugNodeWindow(ImGuiWindow* window, const char* label)
18355{
18356 if (window == NULL)
18357 {
18358 BulletText("%s: NULL", label);
18359 return;
18360 }
18361
18362 ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
18363 const bool is_active = window->WasActive;
18364 ImGuiTreeNodeFlags tree_node_flags = (window == g.NavWindow) ? ImGuiTreeNodeFlags_Selected : ImGuiTreeNodeFlags_None;
18365 if (!is_active) { PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_Text, GetStyleColorVec4(ImGuiCol_TextDisabled)); }
18366 const bool open = TreeNodeEx(label, tree_node_flags, "%s '%s'%s", label, window->Name, is_active ? "" : " *Inactive*");
18367 if (!is_active) { PopStyleColor(); }
18368 if (IsItemHovered() && is_active)
18369 GetForegroundDrawList(window)->AddRect(window->Pos, window->Pos + window->Size, IM_COL32(255, 255, 0, 255));
18370 if (!open)
18371 return;
18372
18373 if (window->MemoryCompacted)
18374 TextDisabled("Note: some memory buffers have been compacted/freed.");
18375
18376 ImGuiWindowFlags flags = window->Flags;
18377 DebugNodeDrawList(window, window->Viewport, window->DrawList, "DrawList");
18378 BulletText("Pos: (%.1f,%.1f), Size: (%.1f,%.1f), ContentSize (%.1f,%.1f) Ideal (%.1f,%.1f)", window->Pos.x, window->Pos.y, window->Size.x, window->Size.y, window->ContentSize.x, window->ContentSize.y, window->ContentSizeIdeal.x, window->ContentSizeIdeal.y);
18379 BulletText("Flags: 0x%08X (%s%s%s%s%s%s%s%s%s..)", flags,
18380 (flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_ChildWindow) ? "Child " : "", (flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_Tooltip) ? "Tooltip " : "", (flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_Popup) ? "Popup " : "",
18381 (flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_Modal) ? "Modal " : "", (flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_ChildMenu) ? "ChildMenu " : "", (flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_NoSavedSettings) ? "NoSavedSettings " : "",
18382 (flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_NoMouseInputs)? "NoMouseInputs":"", (flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_NoNavInputs) ? "NoNavInputs" : "", (flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_AlwaysAutoResize) ? "AlwaysAutoResize" : "");
18383 BulletText("WindowClassId: 0x%08X", window->WindowClass.ClassId);
18384 BulletText("Scroll: (%.2f/%.2f,%.2f/%.2f) Scrollbar:%s%s", window->Scroll.x, window->ScrollMax.x, window->Scroll.y, window->ScrollMax.y, window->ScrollbarX ? "X" : "", window->ScrollbarY ? "Y" : "");
18385 BulletText("Active: %d/%d, WriteAccessed: %d, BeginOrderWithinContext: %d", window->Active, window->WasActive, window->WriteAccessed, (window->Active || window->WasActive) ? window->BeginOrderWithinContext : -1);
18386 BulletText("Appearing: %d, Hidden: %d (CanSkip %d Cannot %d), SkipItems: %d", window->Appearing, window->Hidden, window->HiddenFramesCanSkipItems, window->HiddenFramesCannotSkipItems, window->SkipItems);
18387 for (int layer = 0; layer < ImGuiNavLayer_COUNT; layer++)
18388 {
18389 ImRect r = window->NavRectRel[layer];
18390 if (r.Min.x >= r.Max.y && r.Min.y >= r.Max.y)
18391 {
18392 BulletText("NavLastIds[%d]: 0x%08X", layer, window->NavLastIds[layer]);
18393 continue;
18394 }
18395 BulletText("NavLastIds[%d]: 0x%08X at +(%.1f,%.1f)(%.1f,%.1f)", layer, window->NavLastIds[layer], r.Min.x, r.Min.y, r.Max.x, r.Max.y);
18396 if (IsItemHovered())
18397 GetForegroundDrawList(window)->AddRect(r.Min + window->Pos, r.Max + window->Pos, IM_COL32(255, 255, 0, 255));
18398 }
18399 BulletText("NavLayersActiveMask: %X, NavLastChildNavWindow: %s", window->DC.NavLayersActiveMask, window->NavLastChildNavWindow ? window->NavLastChildNavWindow->Name : "NULL");
18400
18401 BulletText("Viewport: %d%s, ViewportId: 0x%08X, ViewportPos: (%.1f,%.1f)", window->Viewport ? window->Viewport->Idx : -1, window->ViewportOwned ? " (Owned)" : "", window->ViewportId, window->ViewportPos.x, window->ViewportPos.y);
18402 BulletText("ViewportMonitor: %d", window->Viewport ? window->Viewport->PlatformMonitor : -1);
18403 BulletText("DockId: 0x%04X, DockOrder: %d, Act: %d, Vis: %d", window->DockId, window->DockOrder, window->DockIsActive, window->DockTabIsVisible);
18404 if (window->DockNode || window->DockNodeAsHost)
18405 DebugNodeDockNode(window->DockNodeAsHost ? window->DockNodeAsHost : window->DockNode, window->DockNodeAsHost ? "DockNodeAsHost" : "DockNode");
18406
18407 if (window->RootWindow != window) { DebugNodeWindow(window->RootWindow, "RootWindow"); }
18408 if (window->RootWindowDockTree != window->RootWindow) { DebugNodeWindow(window->RootWindowDockTree, "RootWindowDockTree"); }
18409 if (window->ParentWindow != NULL) { DebugNodeWindow(window->ParentWindow, "ParentWindow"); }
18410 if (window->DC.ChildWindows.Size > 0) { DebugNodeWindowsList(&window->DC.ChildWindows, "ChildWindows"); }
18411 if (window->ColumnsStorage.Size > 0 && TreeNode("Columns", "Columns sets (%d)", window->ColumnsStorage.Size))
18412 {
18413 for (int n = 0; n < window->ColumnsStorage.Size; n++)
18414 DebugNodeColumns(&window->ColumnsStorage[n]);
18415 TreePop();
18416 }
18417 DebugNodeStorage(&window->StateStorage, "Storage");
18418 TreePop();
18419}
18420
18421void ImGui::DebugNodeWindowSettings(ImGuiWindowSettings* settings)
18422{
18423 Text("0x%08X \"%s\" Pos (%d,%d) Size (%d,%d) Collapsed=%d",
18424 settings->ID, settings->GetName(), settings->Pos.x, settings->Pos.y, settings->Size.x, settings->Size.y, settings->Collapsed);
18425}
18426
18427void ImGui::DebugNodeWindowsList(ImVector<ImGuiWindow*>* windows, const char* label)
18428{
18429 if (!TreeNode(label, "%s (%d)", label, windows->Size))
18430 return;
18431 for (int i = windows->Size - 1; i >= 0; i--) // Iterate front to back
18432 {
18433 PushID((*windows)[i]);
18434 DebugNodeWindow((*windows)[i], "Window");
18435 PopID();
18436 }
18437 TreePop();
18438}
18439
18440// FIXME-OPT: This is technically suboptimal, but it is simpler this way.
18441void ImGui::DebugNodeWindowsListByBeginStackParent(ImGuiWindow** windows, int windows_size, ImGuiWindow* parent_in_begin_stack)
18442{
18443 for (int i = 0; i < windows_size; i++)
18444 {
18445 ImGuiWindow* window = windows[i];
18446 if (window->ParentWindowInBeginStack != parent_in_begin_stack)
18447 continue;
18448 char buf[20];
18449 ImFormatString(buf, IM_ARRAYSIZE(buf), "[%04d] Window", window->BeginOrderWithinContext);
18450 //BulletText("[%04d] Window '%s'", window->BeginOrderWithinContext, window->Name);
18451 DebugNodeWindow(window, buf);
18452 Indent();
18453 DebugNodeWindowsListByBeginStackParent(windows + i + 1, windows_size - i - 1, window);
18454 Unindent();
18455 }
18456}
18457
18458//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
18459// [SECTION] OTHER DEBUG TOOLS (ITEM PICKER, STACK TOOL)
18460//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
18461
18462// [DEBUG] Item picker tool - start with DebugStartItemPicker() - useful to visually select an item and break into its call-stack.
18463void ImGui::UpdateDebugToolItemPicker()
18464{
18465 ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
18466 g.DebugItemPickerBreakId = 0;
18467 if (!g.DebugItemPickerActive)
18468 return;
18469
18470 const ImGuiID hovered_id = g.HoveredIdPreviousFrame;
18471 SetMouseCursor(ImGuiMouseCursor_Hand);
18472 if (IsKeyPressed(ImGuiKey_Escape))
18473 g.DebugItemPickerActive = false;
18474 if (IsMouseClicked(0) && hovered_id)
18475 {
18476 g.DebugItemPickerBreakId = hovered_id;
18477 g.DebugItemPickerActive = false;
18478 }
18479 SetNextWindowBgAlpha(0.60f);
18480 BeginTooltip();
18481 Text("HoveredId: 0x%08X", hovered_id);
18482 Text("Press ESC to abort picking.");
18483 TextColored(GetStyleColorVec4(hovered_id ? ImGuiCol_Text : ImGuiCol_TextDisabled), "Click to break in debugger!");
18484 EndTooltip();
18485}
18486
18487// [DEBUG] Stack Tool: update queries. Called by NewFrame()
18488void ImGui::UpdateDebugToolStackQueries()
18489{
18490 ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
18491 ImGuiStackTool* tool = &g.DebugStackTool;
18492
18493 // Clear hook when stack tool is not visible
18494 g.DebugHookIdInfo = 0;
18495 if (g.FrameCount != tool->LastActiveFrame + 1)
18496 return;
18497
18498 // Update queries. The steps are: -1: query Stack, >= 0: query each stack item
18499 // We can only perform 1 ID Info query every frame. This is designed so the GetID() tests are cheap and constant-time
18500 const ImGuiID query_id = g.HoveredIdPreviousFrame ? g.HoveredIdPreviousFrame : g.ActiveId;
18501 if (tool->QueryId != query_id)
18502 {
18503 tool->QueryId = query_id;
18504 tool->StackLevel = -1;
18505 tool->Results.resize(0);
18506 }
18507 if (query_id == 0)
18508 return;
18509
18510 // Advance to next stack level when we got our result, or after 2 frames (in case we never get a result)
18511 int stack_level = tool->StackLevel;
18512 if (stack_level >= 0 && stack_level < tool->Results.Size)
18513 if (tool->Results[stack_level].QuerySuccess || tool->Results[stack_level].QueryFrameCount > 2)
18514 tool->StackLevel++;
18515
18516 // Update hook
18517 stack_level = tool->StackLevel;
18518 if (stack_level == -1)
18519 g.DebugHookIdInfo = query_id;
18520 if (stack_level >= 0 && stack_level < tool->Results.Size)
18521 {
18522 g.DebugHookIdInfo = tool->Results[stack_level].ID;
18523 tool->Results[stack_level].QueryFrameCount++;
18524 }
18525}
18526
18527// [DEBUG] Stack tool: hooks called by GetID() family functions
18528void ImGui::DebugHookIdInfo(ImGuiID id, ImGuiDataType data_type, const void* data_id, const void* data_id_end)
18529{
18530 ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
18531 ImGuiWindow* window = g.CurrentWindow;
18532 ImGuiStackTool* tool = &g.DebugStackTool;
18533
18534 // Step 0: stack query
18535 // This assume that the ID was computed with the current ID stack, which tends to be the case for our widget.
18536 if (tool->StackLevel == -1)
18537 {
18538 tool->StackLevel++;
18539 tool->Results.resize(window->IDStack.Size + 1, ImGuiStackLevelInfo());
18540 for (int n = 0; n < window->IDStack.Size + 1; n++)
18541 tool->Results[n].ID = (n < window->IDStack.Size) ? window->IDStack[n] : id;
18542 return;
18543 }
18544
18545 // Step 1+: query for individual level
18546 IM_ASSERT(tool->StackLevel >= 0);
18547 if (tool->StackLevel != window->IDStack.Size)
18548 return;
18549 ImGuiStackLevelInfo* info = &tool->Results[tool->StackLevel];
18550 IM_ASSERT(info->ID == id && info->QueryFrameCount > 0);
18551
18552 int data_len;
18553 switch (data_type)
18554 {
18555 case ImGuiDataType_S32:
18556 ImFormatString(info->Desc, IM_ARRAYSIZE(info->Desc), "%d", (int)(intptr_t)data_id);
18557 break;
18558 case ImGuiDataType_String:
18559 data_len = data_id_end ? (int)((const char*)data_id_end - (const char*)data_id) : (int)strlen((const char*)data_id);
18560 ImFormatString(info->Desc, IM_ARRAYSIZE(info->Desc), "\"%.*s\"", data_len, (const char*)data_id);
18561 break;
18562 case ImGuiDataType_Pointer:
18563 ImFormatString(info->Desc, IM_ARRAYSIZE(info->Desc), "(void*)0x%p", data_id);
18564 break;
18565 case ImGuiDataType_ID:
18566 if (info->Desc[0] == 0) // PushOverrideID() is often used to avoid hashing twice, which would lead to 2 calls to DebugHookIdInfo(). We prioritize the first one.
18567 ImFormatString(info->Desc, IM_ARRAYSIZE(info->Desc), "0x%08X [override]", id);
18568 break;
18569 default:
18570 IM_ASSERT(0);
18571 }
18572 info->QuerySuccess = true;
18573}
18574
18575// Stack Tool: Display UI
18576void ImGui::ShowStackToolWindow(bool* p_open)
18577{
18578 ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
18579 if (!(g.NextWindowData.Flags & ImGuiNextWindowDataFlags_HasSize))
18580 SetNextWindowSize(ImVec2(0.0f, GetFontSize() * 8.0f), ImGuiCond_FirstUseEver);
18581 if (!Begin("Dear ImGui Stack Tool", p_open) || GetCurrentWindow()->BeginCount > 1)
18582 {
18583 End();
18584 return;
18585 }
18586
18587 // Display hovered/active status
18588 const ImGuiID hovered_id = g.HoveredIdPreviousFrame;
18589 const ImGuiID active_id = g.ActiveId;
18590#ifdef IMGUI_ENABLE_TEST_ENGINE
18591 Text("HoveredId: 0x%08X (\"%s\"), ActiveId: 0x%08X (\"%s\")", hovered_id, hovered_id ? ImGuiTestEngine_FindItemDebugLabel(&g, hovered_id) : "", active_id, active_id ? ImGuiTestEngine_FindItemDebugLabel(&g, active_id) : "");
18592#else
18593 Text("HoveredId: 0x%08X, ActiveId: 0x%08X", hovered_id, active_id);
18594#endif
18595 SameLine();
18596 MetricsHelpMarker("Hover an item with the mouse to display elements of the ID Stack leading to the item's final ID.\nEach level of the stack correspond to a PushID() call.\nAll levels of the stack are hashed together to make the final ID of a widget (ID displayed at the bottom level of the stack).\nRead FAQ entry about the ID stack for details.");
18597
18598 // Display decorated stack
18599 ImGuiStackTool* tool = &g.DebugStackTool;
18600 tool->LastActiveFrame = g.FrameCount;
18601 if (tool->Results.Size > 0 && BeginTable("##table", 3, ImGuiTableFlags_Borders))
18602 {
18603 const float id_width = CalcTextSize("0xDDDDDDDD").x;
18604 TableSetupColumn("Seed", ImGuiTableColumnFlags_WidthFixed, id_width);
18605 TableSetupColumn("PushID", ImGuiTableColumnFlags_WidthStretch);
18606 TableSetupColumn("Result", ImGuiTableColumnFlags_WidthFixed, id_width);
18607 TableHeadersRow();
18608 for (int n = 0; n < tool->Results.Size; n++)
18609 {
18610 ImGuiStackLevelInfo* info = &tool->Results[n];
18611 TableNextColumn();
18612 Text("0x%08X", (n > 0) ? tool->Results[n - 1].ID : 0);
18613
18614 TableNextColumn();
18615 ImGuiWindow* window = (info->Desc[0] == 0 && n == 0) ? FindWindowByID(info->ID) : NULL;
18616 if (window) // Source: window name (because the root ID don't call GetID() and so doesn't get hooked)
18617 Text("\"%s\" [window]", window->Name);
18618 else if (info->QuerySuccess) // Source: GetID() hooks (prioritize over ItemInfo() because we frequently use patterns like: PushID(str), Button("") where they both have same id)
18619 TextUnformatted(info->Desc);
18620 else if (tool->StackLevel >= tool->Results.Size) // Only start using fallback below when all queries are done, so during queries we don't flickering ??? markers.
18621 {
18622#ifdef IMGUI_ENABLE_TEST_ENGINE
18623 if (const char* label = ImGuiTestEngine_FindItemDebugLabel(&g, info->ID)) // Source: ImGuiTestEngine's ItemInfo()
18624 Text("??? \"%s\"", label);
18625 else
18626#endif
18627 TextUnformatted("???");
18628 }
18629
18630 TableNextColumn();
18631 Text("0x%08X", info->ID);
18632 if (n == tool->Results.Size - 1)
18633 TableSetBgColor(ImGuiTableBgTarget_CellBg, GetColorU32(ImGuiCol_Header));
18634 }
18635 EndTable();
18636 }
18637 End();
18638}
18639
18640#else

18646void ImGui::DebugNodeDrawCmdShowMeshAndBoundingBox(ImDrawList*, const ImDrawList*, const ImDrawCmd*, bool, bool) {}

18653void ImGui::DebugNodeViewport(ImGuiViewportP*) {}

18656void ImGui::DebugHookIdInfo(ImGuiID, ImGuiDataType, const void*, const void*) {}

18658void ImGui::UpdateDebugToolStackQueries() {}

18665// Prefer just including imgui_internal.h from your code rather than using this define. If a declaration is missing from imgui_internal.h add it or request it on the github.
18666#ifdef IMGUI_INCLUDE_IMGUI_USER_INL
